hotel_one_review: Located in Downtown, this metropolitan luxury hotel offers spacious rooms, a bar and locker rooms.
description: Authentic heritage and contemporary sophistication attract travelers from around the world to Boston's most beloved hotel: Boston Park Plaza. Guests quickly discover that the 1927 historic hotel is still timeless and always in-style. The hotel features 1,060 guestrooms, 57 suites, Leica Store and Gallery, exclusive access to Lynx Fitness Club and TopGolf Swing Suites, fine dining from STRIP by Strega and all-American fare by Off the Common. The Boston Park Plaza is located in historic Back Bay, just steps away from America's oldest public park, the Boston Common. Within walking distance: shopping on Newbury Street, Theatre and Financial Districts, Faneuil Hall Marketplace, and a host of other historical Boston sites. Looking for meeting or event space? We’ve got that and more to accommodate even the most high-powered affairs. Our beautifully renovated 13,215 sq. ft. ballroom and 32 individual conference rooms, adapt for a wide variety of events for groups of 10 to 2,200.

hotel_one_review: Stylish high-end hotel featuring elegant marina-view rooms with a rooftop bar, a beach and a fitness center.
description: To our guests,​ We've missed you so much! We can’t wait to welcome you back to Beauport Hotel here in Gloucester. These past few months have presented many challenges, as we navigate these times and develop a positive and safe way forward, one that best serves our guests and team. We’ve had to create and plan “new ways of hospitality” – committing to providing guest experiences at the same level that we always have, while adjusting to keep our guests and employees protected, our single and greatest priority. Our reopening is guided by a comprehensive set of health safety and sanitation procedures, with consult from many government and health organizations, the American Hotel and Lodging Association, and our own founding - as well as the procurement of the very best sanitation resources, products, and practices. Please visit our website, BeauportHotel.com to see our comprehensive BSafe commitment to Health and Safety guidelines and protocols

hotel_one_review: Idyllic family-friendly hotel in Seaport District offering spacious ocean-view rooms with a breakfast buffet, bikes for guests and a heated pool.
description: The Seaport Hotel has re-opened, effective July 22nd, and the well-being of our guests, team members, vendors and community remains our highest priority. We will continue to follow all Federal, State and Local regulations as we plan to welcome you back. Should we need to revise our operation plans at any point based on their directions, we will certainly do so. TAMO Bistro + Bar will reopen to the public on July 22 from 4 - 10 pm daily. The Seaport Cafe will open on July 22, only to hotel guests, from 6:30 am - 2 pm. Wave Health & Fitness will reopen at a later date, however the swimming pool will open by August 6 to hotel guests but it will remain closed Mondays - Wednesdays. Aura restaurant will remain closed. Please note the Seaport Garage has been and continues to remain open. Our website will remain the best source for updates and hours of operation – www.seaportboston.com. We look forward to welcoming you back to Seaport.

hotel_one_review: Metropolitan business-friendly hotel offering spacious sleek rooms with bikes for guests, a heated pool and a bar.
description: Located just minutes from downtown Boston and a variety of world-class attractions, The Charles is a AAA Four Diamond Hotel and a proud member of Preferred Hotels and Resorts. Reflecting the eclecticism that is Cambridge, The Charles Hotel is a modern interpretation of New England hospitality with a thriving jazz club, the Regattabar; two signature restaurants: Henrietta's Table and Benedetto; seasonal farmers market; state of the art conference facilities; Corbu Spa & Salon; and a central location in the heart of Harvard Square.

hotel_one_review: Romantic premium hotel in Downtown with chic rooms, a restaurant and a fitness center.
description: For a complete list of all we are doing please visit www.xvbeacon.com/covid-19

hotel_one_review: Chic restored rooms in a quaint family-friendly hotel located in Downtown featuring a restaurant, hiking and a fitness center.
description: At Omni Hotels & Resorts, the health and safety of our guests and associates has always been, and always will be, our top priority. COVID-19 has changed every facet of our world and the way we do business. In an effort to Stay A Part of Safety, we have updated our already thorough cleaning guidelines and implemented additional processes and procedures to ensure your health, safety and comfort as part of the new “Omni Safe & Clean” initiative. The Omni Safe & Clean initiative follows the guidelines set forth by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and each individual Omni location will adhere to local and/or federal mandates. Protocols and guidelines from these authorities are expected to evolve, and as such, so will our below processes and procedures. Similarly, these guidelines meet or exceed the “Stay Safe” initiative set forth by the American Hotel & Lodging Association (AHLA).

hotel_name: The Porches Inn at MASS MoCA
hotel_one_review: Lovely business-friendly hotel featuring snug rooms, board games and a breakfast buffet.
description: The Porches Inn consists of seven renovated Victorian-era buildings that originally provided housing for the area’s mill workers. Located across the street from MASS MoCA, Porches’ guest rooms and public spaces employ a clever synthesis of retro and contemporary designs. The inn’s 47 rooms and suites are fully wired, offering free WiFi, BluRay/DVD players and complimentary DVDs. Porches' healthful continental breakfast is included in the room rate and may be eaten in the Breakfast Room, on the porch (weather permitting) or delivered to your room in the inn's signature metal lunchbox. The inn features a year-round heated outdoor pool, hot tub, sauna, bonfire pit, fitness room and meeting rooms for retreats and special events.

hotel_one_review: Airy chic rooms in a romantic business-friendly hotel with a restaurant, evening entertainment and a hot tub.
description: Welcoming guests with genuine New England hospitality for over two centuries. Antique-filled rooms, suites, & guesthouses. Contemporary regional cuisine, 3 restaurants, elegant & casual indoor & outdoor dining, award-winning wine list. Heated year-round outdoor pool & hot tub, Gift Shop, WiFi. Live entertainment nightly in pub. Memorable weddings & events. Small to mid-size meetings, unique spaces.

hotel_one_review: Located in Back Bay, this romantic family-friendly hotel offers down-to-earth rooms, a bar and a concierge.
description:
We hope this message finds you and your family safe and healthy. The unprecedented consequences of this pandemic have certainly been a challenge for us all. As we prepare for the eventual return to normalcy, we eagerly look forward to welcoming you to Boston and to The Eliot Hotel; your small, private and safe home away from home. Prospective guests can be assured that our suites will be prepared impeccably and our entire staff will be ready to provide the signature level of hospitality and service the Eliot is renowned for.

Thank you and stay safe!

hotel_one_review: Welcoming mid-priced hotel offering bay-view rooms, a beach and a bar.
description: With 150 guest rooms and 14 multi-bedroom villas, the Red Jacket Beach Resort enjoys a fabulous location on 1,000 feet of private sandy beach on Nantucket Sound. Recently updated guest rooms; many offer spectacular views of the ocean. The resort features indoor/outdoor heated pools, as well as a zero-entry children's pool. The Kids' Club, a supervised children's program is offered during summer season along with family activities throughout the summer season on a complimentary basis. Also featuring on-site fishing, tennis, beach volleyball, and shuffleboard, with docking facilities available for small boats on Parker's River. The Red Jacket's dining room serves signature New England cuisine. The Red Jacket Beach is the perfect setting for corporate retreats, reunions, and tour groups, as well as for weddings and boasts 6,000 square feet of meeting and banquet space. Open from early April until late October.

hotel_one_review: Located in Beacon Hill, this lovely high-end hotel features breakfast, a fitness center and a concierge.
description: BEACON HILL’S NEWEST GEM. NOW OPEN. This summer, experience The Whitney Hotel, an unexpected find in Boston’s beloved Beacon Hill. The Whitney is a luxury boutique hotel reflecting the residential charm of our surrounding neighborhood. The Whitney balances the vibrancy of the city with our idyllic location, giving you easy access to the city's best attractions while also offering an escape from the hustle. Retreat to one of our 65 guestrooms, where you will be greeted with generous hospitality and cultured comforts. Explore our lush courtyard garden, enjoy savory Mediterranean cuisine at Peregrine, and indulge in our sophisticated amenities. We have everything you need to feel at home during your time in Boston.

hotel_one_review: Located in West End, this enchanting business-friendly hotel with contemporary city-view rooms offers evening entertainment, fitness classes and breakfast.
description: To all of our guests we wish you safety, comfort and health during this difficult time. The Courtyard Boston Downtown North Station is ready and waiting to serve visitors to Boston and look forward to hosting your stay. Stay safe and be well. #lovefromboston

hotel_one_review: Located in Back Bay, this lovely business-friendly hotel offers stately rooms, breakfast and a fitness center.
description:
In the midst of the Coronavirus (COVID-19) concerns, we would like to assure you that Courtyard Boston Copley Square places the highest priority on the health and safety of our guests and associates. 

The CDC recommends everyday preventive actions to help prevent the spread of respiratory illnesses like coronavirus/COVID-19. Recommendations include staying home when sick, washing hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, following proper respiratory cough etiquette, avoiding close contact with people who are sick and avoiding touching eyes, nose, and mouth with unwashed hands.
 
We will also ask that every employee, guest and visitor abide by local regulations in place regarding the use of masks while you are inside the hotel and to abide by social distancing practices of at least 6 ft.  

We appreciate your business and loyalty to Courtyard Boston Copley Square. Our entire team is working hard to provide a safe environment for all to ensure the overall health & safety.

hotel_one_review: Spacious casual rooms in a charming family-friendly hotel located in Back Bay offering bike rentals, a fitness center and a restaurant.
description: The health and well-being of our guests and employees are of the greatest importance to us. We are carefully monitoring the COVID-19 situation and are collaborating with city and state officials to stay fully informed. In addition to our always diligent housekeeping, we have proactively implemented extra resources and sanitary procedures as preemptive measures. For more detailed information on what to expect, please visit our website directly at https://www.lenoxhotel.com/hotel-services-during-covid-19/

hotel_one_review: Contemporary rooms in a modern business-friendly hotel located in Downtown offering a fitness center, a concierge and breakfast.
description: Vibrant and Alive! Stay in the heart of one of America’s most celebrated cities and let Hyatt Centric Faneuil Hall Boston provide an uncomplicated travel experience for you, the modern-day explorer. Discover all that Boston offers from our central Downtown location. Your just steps away from historical landmarks, neighborhoods and major businesses including the Financial District, Freedom Trail, Post Office Square, Government Center, Faneuil Hall, Beacon Hill, Seaport, North End and the Theatre District.

hotel_one_review: Airy chic rooms in a lovely mid-range hotel located in Seaport District featuring free internet, free breakfast and a fitness center.
description: We are committed to offering an environment that aligns with expert protocols for working to defeat COVID-19. Consisting of in-house and outside experts in food and water safety, hygiene and infection prevention, and hotel operations, our Marriott Cleanliness Council is redefining our cleaning and safety standards. Starting with our public spaces and high-traffic areas, Marriott is going above and beyond our normal protocols. We are cleaning surfaces with increased frequency, dedicated staff, and recommended cleaning agents. Marriott has elevated our rigorous protocols to thoroughly clean all surfaces with hospital-grade disinfectants. We will be placing disinfectant wipes in rooms. Hand sanitizing stations are being installed at hotel entrances, at our front desks, our elevator banks, and meeting spaces. Signage in public spaces will remind Marriott guests to maintain social distancing. Read more about Marriott’s Commitment to Clean by visiting https://clean.marriott.com/.

hotel_one_review: Magnificent contemporary rooms in a charming mid-priced hotel with bbq facilities, beach access and a restaurant.
description: The Main House of this historic hotel dates back to 1845 and was the home of an affluent whaling captain. Today, this historic hotel welcomes guests to the Main House and directly next door, to the Daniel Webster House. Guests will find modern amenities with the newly refurbished library/parlor--where complimentary continental breakfast is served each morning. All rooms are air-conditioned. Free Wi-Fi is available in the rooms and throughout the hotel. Guest rooms have been updated with stunning traditional-style furniture. With the hotel's superb location, just steps from boutiques and excellent restaurants, guests enjoy wandering the cobblestone streets or visiting the many nearby museums and beaches.

hotel_name: Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport
hotel_one_review: Located in Harbor View, this welcoming family-friendly hotel with contemporary rooms offers a fitness center, beach access and a restaurant.
description:
A Cleaner Stay from Check-in to Check-Out
Hilton has partnered with RB, makers of Lysol® & Dettol®*, to help deliver an even cleaner stay for our guests with the Hilton CleanStay program. Building on our already rigorous cleaning standards, the program includes:

-Hilton CleanStay Room Seal to indicate that guest rooms haven’t been accessed since they were cleaned
-Extra disinfection of top 10 high touch areas in guest rooms including light switches and door handles
-Increased cleaning frequency of public areas and fitness centers
-Guest-accessible disinfecting wipes at entrances and high traffic areas
-Enhanced cleaning & other changes to buffets, in-room dining and meeting spaces
-Industry-leading contactless check-in and check-out with Digital Key at more than 4,700 properties globally

Our promise is to deliver the same level of reliable and friendly service you’d expect from Hilton, but with the added confidence of industry-leading hygiene practices created to keep you safe.

hotel_one_review: Pleasant business-friendly hotel offering contemporary rooms, a breakfast buffet and a fitness center.
description: In the heart of the Commonwealth sits Central Massachusetts’s only AAA Four Diamond rated property, the Beechwood Hotel, a proud member of the Preferred Hotels & Resorts Connect Collection. Artful and luxurious, this is an ideal location for both leisure and business travel. The boutique hotel features museum-quality art including century-old travel, music, and theatre themed lithographs, historical stained glass pieces, distinctive architecture, and a black walnut fireplace that formerly resided in a 1800s-era New England homestead. Savor fine dining at the renowned DiRōNA Awarded Sonoma Restaurant, recognized for dining excellence by the Distinguished Restaurants of North America. Fifty-two European-inspired deluxe guestrooms and 21 elegantly appointed suites equipped with luxurious amenities invite you to rest and rejuvenate in serene surroundings. Plantation shutters, a neutral color palate and high-end touches like granite countertops lend to upscale simplicity. Rest by a crackling hearth in one of the Beechwood’s Fireplace Suites or treat yourself to the ultimate experience with our Presidential Suite. If you’re planning a gathering or celebration, the Beechwood boasts over 8,000 square feet of flexible meeting and event space. Our distinguished Grand Ballroom accommodates up to 250 guests and is home to our Maria Gill Wilson Room, a historic chapel featuring breathtaking stained glass windows, a soaring cathedral ceiling with hand-carved wooden beams, and elegant pendant lighting. The Beechwood is well-known for its impeccable service, award-winning cuisine, luxurious accommodations, and professional event planners. Located minutes from downtown Worcester and adjacent to Massachusetts Biotechnology Research Park, the Beechwood Hotel is right in the middle of everything. From the DCU Center to UMASS Medical School and popular area attractions, you’ll find all you need right around the corner. Carefree accessibility is made easy with Rt-290 bisecting the city. Those commuting in and out of Worcester have access to several major highways to the north, south, east, and west. Air travel is made seamless with the Worcester Regional Airport providing daily flights to Philadelphia, Orlando, New York City, and Fort Lauderdale. Boston Logan International Airport and the T.F. Green Airport are also nearby. Although there is plenty to do right in the heart of Worcester, visitors who want a taste of Boston can take the train out of Union Station, a beautifully restored historic building marked by two white marble towers. The Beechwood Hotel takes pride in being like nothing you expect and everything you deserve, and this shows in every facet of your experience. From the unsurpassed ambiance of Sonoma Restaurant to chic room furnishings, the Beechwood Hotel provides a distinct level of luxury for your home away from home. The Beechwood Hotel offers amazing amenities to enhance your stay and ensure that your experience exceeds your expectations.

hotel_one_review: Metropolitan mid-priced hotel in Fenway featuring a gift shop, free wifi and a restaurant.
description: The Inn at Longwood Medical center is open and available for reservations.  All of our staff are in masks and we require our guests to wear masks as well.  There are ample hand sanitizing stations throughout the hotel.  Our Longwood Grille is open for dining with socially distanced tables, as is the Galleria Food Court.  Hotel public spaces are sprayed daily with electromagnetic sanitizer.

hotel_one_review: Restored lake-view rooms in a quaint mid-range hotel with breakfast, canoes and an outdoor fireplace.
description: Whether you are planning a relaxing retreat, seeking a couple's getaway, or traveling with a group, the LakeHouse Inn invites guests to experience a luxury waterfront stay. The Inn sits on top of a cliff providing some of the best Berkshire views and sunsets. The LakeHouse's accommodations, mindful service, waterfront location and amenities contribute to the true Berkshire experience.

hotel_one_review: Contemporary rooms in a tranquil mid-priced hotel with public wifi, a bar and private balconies.

hotel_one_review: Romantic upscale hotel in Back Bay featuring stately contemporary rooms with in-room breakfast, a hot tub and bike rentals.
description: An intimate, luxurious hotel, Mandarin Oriental, Boston combines classic New England elegance with refined Oriental touches to create one of the most distinctive hospitality experiences in the region. Awarded both Forbes Five-Stars and AAA Five-Diamonds, Mandarin Oriental, Boston features 148 guestrooms and suites over 14 floors, delighting its guests with the finest facilities and service, innovative dining experiences and an unparalleled holistic Five-Star awarded spa. A short, 15-minute drive to Logan International Airport, Mandarin Oriental, Boston connects guests to the city's finest shopping, cultural venues and business institutions from its prime location in the heart of the chic Back Bay on Boylston Street.

hotel_one_review: Modern mid-priced hotel offering sleek contemporary rooms with a bar, a convenience store and a casino.
description: Casino & Amenities Now Open! Hotel reopening at a later date. If you’re looking for a trendy hotel in Springfield, look no further than MGM Springfield. For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Springfield, MGM Springfield is located a short distance from Springfield Central Library (0.4 mi) and Springfield College (1.5 mi). Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and guests can go online with wifi. MGM Springfield features room service and a concierge, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and a lounge. If you are driving to MGM Springfield, free parking is available. When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Jack's Lobster Shack, The Chandler Steakhouse, and Cal Mare, which are some seafood restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike. Springfield is also known for some great monuments and statues, including Dr. Seuss National Memorial Sculpture Garden, William Pynchon Statue, and Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame, which are not too far from MGM Springfield. The staff at MGM Springfield looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit. Due to current uncertainty as a result of COVID-19, all reservations are subject to cancellation by MGM Resorts.

hotel_one_review: Lovely luxury hotel in Downtown featuring airy park-view rooms with board games, a restaurant and a fitness center.
description:
At Four Seasons, we are focused on providing guests and employees with the confidence that their health and safety is our first priority. We have implemented full-scale enhancements to our already stringent procedures through our global health and safety program, Lead With Care. Grounded in health care expertise and enabled by access to leading technologies and tools, Lead With Care sets out clear procedures that educate and empower employees to take care of guests and each other. 

As you think about your travel plans, we invite you to visit Welcome Back, a centralized place to find the latest information about Lead With Care, property reopenings and current facility availability. Please also review all government entry and exit requirements and any relevant travel restrictions.

While the Four Seasons experience may look different, it will feel the same. It will still be our people delivering the same intuitive service and personalized care for which our brand is known and trusted.

hotel_one_review: Charming family-friendly hotel in Downtown featuring airy river-view rooms with a patio, a breakfast buffet and a heated pool.
description: Take comfort in knowing the Boston Harbor Hotel's highest priority remains the health and safety of our associates, guests, neighbors, family & friends. Whether you have an existing reservation with us, or are considering a future visit to our hotel, please know that we have escalated our health & safety precautions to ensure that everything we do meets or exceeds the guidelines set by both the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and the World Health Organization (WHO). We will continue to elevate our standards as best practices evolve. When you’re ready, we look forward to delivering the same great Beyond Compare hospitality you've come to know and love at our waterfront hotel – an iconic beacon of hope for the city of Boston. We encourage you to review the Boston Harbor Hotel Enhanced Health & Safety Guidelines at https://www.bhh.com/travel-update in which summarizes what you should expect when you visit us.

hotel_one_review: Urban premium hotel in Downtown featuring chic park-view rooms with a concierge, breakfast and a sauna.
description: We are committed to offering an environment that aligns with expert protocols for working to defeat COVID-19. Consisting of in-house and outside experts in food and water safety, hygiene and infection prevention, and hotel operations, our Marriott Cleanliness Council is redefining our cleaning and safety standards. Starting with our public spaces and high-traffic areas, Marriott is going above and beyond our normal protocols. We are cleaning surfaces with increased frequency, dedicated staff, and recommended cleaning agents. Marriott has elevated our rigorous protocols to thoroughly clean all surfaces with hospital-grade disinfectants. We will be placing disinfectant wipes in rooms. Hand sanitizing stations are being installed at hotel entrances, at our front desks, our elevator banks, and meeting spaces. Signage in public spaces will remind Marriott guests to maintain social distancing. Read more about Marriott’s Commitment to Clean by visiting https://clean.marriott.com/.

hotel_one_review: Enchanting premium hotel offering striking rooms, a golf course and breakfast.
description: "Here at Mirbeau Inn & Spa the health, safety, and comfort of our guests are our top priorities. We've taken steps to meet and exceed all CDC and state directives for maintaining a safe environment for our staff and visitors. A comprehensive, up-to-date description of our policies and services can be found on our website at https://plymouth.mirbeau.com/covid-19/ We look forward to having you back soon! " -- Patty McPherson, General Manager

hotel_one_review: Contemporary rooms in a trendy family-friendly hotel with a concierge, a fitness center and a restaurant.
description: Burlington is Boston's most buzzy northwest suburb and home to 3rd Ave, a fashionable town center with distinctive dining, unique shops and the region's only Wegmans. Archer joins the wonderfully walkable neighborhood with a four-story boutique hotel designed to showcase a signature industrial-chic style brimming with curated local touches. Here, Archer greets guests with refined design, 147 luxe guest rooms and suites, chic venues for meetings and events, a lively cocktail bar and patio and stellar, sincere service. Curated house art throughout the hotel — public spaces, rooms, corridors — incorporates a local flavor, while each room’s five-star bedding, walk-in shower, complimentary Nespresso® coffee experience and whimsical slippers underscore Archer’s unique boutique experience.

hotel_name: The Liberty, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Boston
hotel_one_review: Located in West End, this enchanting business-friendly hotel with striking river-view rooms offers bikes for guests, breakfast and yoga classes.
description:
We are working diligently to ensure that our hotel continues to provide essential services in this challenging environment.

We take standards for hygiene and cleanliness very seriously; we are closely monitoring and following the CDC and WHO guidance regarding COVID-19, as well as guidance from local health authorities. Our health and safety measures include everything from handwashing hygiene, to hospital grade cleaning product specifications for guest room and common area cleaning procedures. If a colleague exhibits symptoms of COVID-19, they are instructed not to return to work and instead seek appropriate medical attention. Should a guest exhibit symptoms, our priority is to safely relocate them to a place where they may receive appropriate medical attention.
 
With the COVID-19 situation rapidly evolving, we recommend that all guests consult local authorities to understand the latest travel restrictions before they commence their travel.

hotel_one_review: Spacious bay-view rooms in a pleasant business-friendly hotel with a hot tub, beach access and a rooftop terrace.
description:
New Free 48 Hour Change of Dates for all 2020 reservations.
Changing Times, Changing Rates- please call 508-693-2200.
Rooms Cleaned and Unoccupied between Guest Arrivals.

In addition to enhanced cleaning protocols, all guest rooms are immediately cleaned after check-out  and kept unoccupied for at least 24 hours before arrivals. As a winner of the AAA Best of Housekeeping 2020 Award, Mansion House Inn is confident in our unparalleled housekeeping service. Guests can also take advantage of our new 48 Hour Change of Date Policy, allowing reservations to be changed to later dates up to two days before arrival in these uncertain times.

hotel_one_review: Enchanting family-friendly hotel in Downtown offering striking contemporary rooms with a bar, a fitness center and evening entertainment.
description: More information about our health & safety standards and how we address levels of of hygiene and sanitation can be found on our website: www.millenniumhotels.com/en/offers/global/wecleancarewelcome

description:

•	All staff required to wear facemasks and gloves as part of uniform.
•	Self-parking available to all guests driving to the hotel.

hotel_one_review: Striking contemporary rooms in an enchanting mid-priced hotel with a poolside bar, bikes for guests and a private pool.
description:
YOUR COMFORT & SAFETY ARE OUR TOP PRIORITY

Our most important consideration is the well-being of our community and guests, and as the COVID-19 situation evolves we continue to update our policies and procedures to implement guidance from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and the World Health Organization (WHO). As we prepare to welcome our guests once again, we are committed to providing a safe environment that aligns with local, state, and federal guidance for working to defeat COVID-19.

The Kelley House COVID-19 Task Force consists of in-house and outside experts in food and water safety, hygiene and infection prevention, and hotel operations, Our Task Force is heightening and refining our already high cleaning and safety standards and is actively monitoring the latest guidelines and protocols from the CDC, WHO, and state and local health officials as well as hospitality industry experts.

hotel_one_review: Located in Fenway, this trendy business-friendly hotel offers stately rooms, evening entertainment and a restaurant.
description: Greetings Rock Star, As we begin to welcome you, our Rock Stars back to The Verb Hotel, we are committed to providing a safer environment for all guests and staff members. Our strategies and protocols stay in tune with the World Health Organization, Center for Disease Control and our Local Government guidelines currently set in place. We are and will be consistently evolving with the most up to date information as it is provided to us. Earlier this year we received the “AAA inspector’s Best of Housekeeping 2020” award combined with our continued 5- Star Trip Advisor Score for cleanliness validates our passion and commitment to providing a safe and healthy environment for your stay. Please visit www.theverbhotel.com for more details. If you have any questions or concerns, please call me directly at (410) 977.1989 or email me at paul@theverbhotel.com. Kindest Regards Paul Leader, General Manager

hotel_one_review: Scenic business-friendly hotel offering city-view rooms, bike rentals and a restaurant.
description:
A Cleaner Stay from Check-in to Check-Out
Hilton has partnered with RB, makers of Lysol® & Dettol®*, to help deliver an even cleaner stay for our guests with the Hilton CleanStay program. Building on our already rigorous cleaning standards, the program includes:

-Hilton CleanStay Room Seal to indicate that guest rooms haven’t been accessed since they were cleaned
-Extra disinfection of top 10 high touch areas in guest rooms including light switches and door handles
-Increased cleaning frequency of public areas and fitness centers
-Guest-accessible disinfecting wipes at entrances and high traffic areas
-Enhanced cleaning & other changes to buffets, in-room dining and meeting spaces
-Industry-leading contactless check-in and check-out with Digital Key at more than 4,700 properties globally

Our promise is to deliver the same level of reliable and friendly service you’d expect from Hilton, but with the added confidence of industry-leading hygiene practices created to keep you safe.

hotel_one_review: Metropolitan mid-priced hotel in West End with city-view rooms, a restaurant and a fitness center.
description: We want you to feel safe at any citizenM hotel you visit. Our cleaning routine was already world-class – now, it’s beyond amazing. Below you’ll see what actions we’re taking for your health and safety. -every hotel is now cashless -hand sanitizers throughout public areas -no bedspreads or carpets in guestrooms -we use a 75% alcohol-based disinfectant -clear social distancing signs and set safety routes -living rooms and canteenMs cleaned 6 times a day -public restrooms and elevators cleaned every hour -rooms are cleaned and disinfected after every guest -masks are required in line with local regulations -lift capacity is set according to the local regulations -protocols already in place in case of a suspected infection -electrostatic sprayers to disinfect luggage and public areas -clean and disinfect guestrooms every 3 days for long stays -guestrooms are independently ventilated with 100% fresh air -easy-to-clean innovative materials like Corian® in guestrooms

hotel_name: White Elephant - Hotel - Garden Cottages - Lofts
hotel_one_review: Intimate family-friendly hotel offering marina-view rooms, beach access and breakfast.
description: The White Elephant has been an exclusive summertime retreat since the 1920s. The height of preppy New England elegance, this is the place where brides dream of being married and families come for generations. A stone's throw from the center of town, this 67-room island treasure has accommodations ranging from rooms and suites in the iconic Harborside Hotel to sweet Garden Cottages as well as luxurious downtown Lofts. Under a separate listing you will find the White Elephant Residences and Inn. The hotel's mascot, a white elephant named Trunket, presides over its greener than green lawn. Set with plush lounge chairs, it overlooks bustling Nantucket Harbor and calm Children's Beach. Brant Point Grill serves up a famed Sunday brunch, with their signature Lobster Bloody Mary.

hotel_one_review: Intimate family-friendly hotel offering park-view rooms, bike rentals and breakfast.
description: Our historic hotel, adjacent to the Common in Salem, MA boasts 89 rooms, including 6 suites. Ideal for business and leisure travelers to Boston and the North Shore, we offer complimentary on-site parking and are within walking distance to the MBTA train and Boston Harbor ferry. Our rooms offer local, hand-crafted Gardner Mattresses©, hypo-allergenic Beyond Down pillows, all natural and organic Pharmacopia bath products and CubieTime alarm clocks with USB power outlets. Guests can enjoy complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi throughout the hotel, complimentary coffee, tea and newspapers in the Lobby, and free use of the local YMCA. Lobby restrooms and a number of guest rooms are handicapped accessible. Built in 1925, the Hawthorne is a proud member of Historic Hotels of America and New England Inns & Resorts and is a certified Age-Friendly Salem business. As an alternative, we also offer an adjacent guest house with four traditionally appointed bedrooms. Built in 1807 and named for local nature artist Fidelia Bridges, the structure is a fine example of Federal-period architecture featuring wide pine floors, low ceilings and historic detail. Rooms at the guest house are recommended for one to two travelers and are not handicapped accessible. Due to the unique configuration of our guest rooms, we do suggest speaking with a member of our Front Desk team to ensure you are booking the most appropriate room type for your needs.

description: Club Quarters is implementing a certified safety and cleaning program to ensure the daily safety, cleanliness, sanitizing and disinfection of all our hotels in the United States & London. The program focuses on the entire guest journey throughout a hotel stay. We have taken the utmost care to strictly follow, and even exceed the guidelines provided by local and federal governments in each of our locations as well as the CDC (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention), the WHO (World Health Organization), the NHS (National Health Service) and the AHLA (American Hotel and Lodging Association). description: Sonesta is committed to providing a safe and secure environment for our guests, visitors and employees. Working with our primary partner, Ecolab, we have created Stay Safe with Sonesta – a program that exceeds all CDC, WHO, and governmental requirements and recommendations related to the Coronavirus pandemic. This program will evolve as we continue to update our procedures and protocols to ensure our standards maintain the most relevant levels of protection for our guests and employees. Hotel team members have received training to ensure they are ready to deliver at the higher standards we’ve set including the following areas: Guest Protection & Social Distancing Cleanliness & Disinfection Protocols Employee Safety & Preparedness Guest Room Modifications for Safety Group & Meeting Space Protocols Sonesta is a participant in the Safe Stay initiative created by the American Hotel & Lodging Association. sonesta.com/staysafe

hotel_one_review: Located in North End, this scenic business-friendly hotel with serene ocean-view rooms offers fitness classes, a concierge and a coffee shop.
description: The centerpiece of Boston's Battery Wharf renaissance, The Battery Wharf Hotel, Boston Waterfront merges the North End's trademark charm with a contemporary appreciation for history and sense of place. Featuring 150 stylishly designed guest rooms and suites with extraordinary waterfront views, this luxurious boutique hotel on the pedestrian-friendly HarborWalk boasts two bars and restaurants, 6,000 square feet of meeting space, an award-winning Spa and Fitness Center and easy access to Boston's bustling Financial District, Freedom Trail, Faneuil Hall Marketplace and TD Garden, New England's premier sports and entertainment arena.

hotel_one_review: Charming eco-friendly hotel in Downtown with stately rooms, a nightclub and breakfast.
description:
Harborside Inn is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Boston, offering a quaint environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.

Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Faneuil Hall Marketplace (0.2 mi) and Acorn Street (0.8 mi), guests of Harborside Inn Boston can easily experience some of Boston's most well known attractions.

As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.

Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, baggage storage, and express check-in and check-out while staying at Harborside Inn Boston. In addition, Harborside Inn Boston offers breakfast, which will help make your Boston trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.

If you like Spanish restaurants, Harborside Inn Boston is conveniently located near Barcelona, Toro, and Orinoco.

If you’re looking for something to do, Freedom Trail (0.6 mi), Boston Tea Party Ships & Museum (0.5 mi), and HarborWalk (0.1 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Harborside Inn Boston.

Enjoy your stay in Boston!

hotel_one_review: Urban business-friendly hotel in Fenway featuring serene low-key rooms with a fitness center, breakfast and shops.
description: A thoughtful reimagining of what a Boston hotel can be, Hotel Commonwealth unhinges luxury from its traditional definition to bring guests urban vibrance and the ultimate in unscripted hospitality, right in Kenmore Square. That our stylish spot flanks Boston's beloved Fenway Park shines bright on its list of perks, as does being in easy embrace of the city's prominent academic, medical, technology areas. Offering notably ample guestrooms, an authentic "of-service" culture, and food so good even the locals are loyal, our hotel has distinguished itself as a Boston favorite. Modern interiors remain faithful to the hotel's legendary welcoming feel, blending effortless style with considered comforts to create a relaxed urban destination. The result? A refreshingly real hotel where travel smart professionals and knowing influentials converge for inspiration and the unbridled joy of getting it right. This is Hotel Commonwealth.

description: We are committed to offering an environment that aligns with expert protocols for working to defeat COVID-19. Consisting of in-house and outside experts in food and water safety, hygiene and infection prevention, and hotel operations, our Marriott Cleanliness Council is redefining our cleaning and safety standards. hotel_name: Staypineapple, A Delightful Hotel, South End Boston
hotel_one_review: Located in South End, this tranquil mid-priced hotel offers contemporary rooms, bikes for guests and free internet.
description:
Our guests can feel safe and confident when choosing Staypineapple!  Hotel team members complete an extensive Procter & Gamble certification training program utilizing CDC certified disinfectants, proven to eliminate Covid-19.

Zero Contact Guest Experience: From check-in to check-out guests are not required to come in contact with any hotel team member.

Stayclean Room Seal: A seal on the guest room door means the room is sanitized and ready for guests. We use a sanitizing mist sprayer that applies disinfectant to the entire room between each stay.

Linens & towels are sealed for safety prior to delivery.  All in-room essentials are safety-sealed and non-essential items are removed and available upon request. Disinfecting wipes are placed in each room.

Additional Precautions: Hotel team members wear personal protective equipment. Guests must wear a mask in common areas of the hotel for their own protection and that of others. Hand sanitizer stations are placed throughout the hotel.

hotel_one_review: Pleasant eco-friendly hotel offering mountain-view rooms, a tennis court and a pool.
description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Hancock, Wyndham at Bentley Brook is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its charming environment and proximity to great restaurants, Wyndham at Bentley Brook makes it easy to enjoy the best of Hancock.

Rooms at Wyndham at Bentley Brook offer a flat screen TV, a kitchenette, and air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.

A pool and barbeque facilities will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Wyndham At Bentley Brook Hotel, free parking is available.

Given the close proximity to Ioka Valley Farm (1.3 mi), guests of Wyndham at Bentley Brook can easily experience one of Hancock's most popular landmarks.

Travelers looking to enjoy some shrimp can head to John Harvard's Restaurant & Brewery. Otherwise, you may want to check out a pub such as Christiansen's Tavern.

Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Wyndham at Bentley Brook is sure to make your visit to Hancock one worth remembering.

description:
Choice Hotels takes pride in its hotels’ long-standing dedication to cleanliness, including our 150+ point cleanliness checklist already on every housekeeping cart as part of the Room Condition & Cleanliness program.  

As part of the Commitment to Clean initiative, Choice Hotels has provided our franchisees additional educational resources - enhanced best practices and extensive cleaning, disinfecting, hygiene, and social distancing best practices and protocols - leveraging partnerships with industry leaders and providing hotels with the latest resources and training. 

In addition, every Choice-branded hotel will designate a “Commitment to Clean Captain,” who will complete best-in-class cleanliness training and will be responsible for incorporating the new protocols into their hotel’s operations. 

Choice is a signatory to the U.S. Travel Association’s Industry Guidelines to Ensure the Health and Safety of Travelers.

hotel_one_review: Charming mid-priced hotel offering magnificent rooms, skiing and in-room breakfast.
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Lee? Then look no further than Chambery Inn, a historic hotel that brings the best of Lee to your doorstep.

Chambery Inn is a historic hotel offering a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.

The hotel features room service and newspaper. Plus, guests can enjoy a hot tub and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Lee. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.

Given the close proximity to High Lawn Farm (1.4 mi), guests of Chambery Hotel can easily experience one of Lee's most popular landmarks.

Lee has plenty of pubs. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like 51 Park Restaurant & Tavern, Moe's Tavern, and Locker Room Sports Pub, which are serving up some great dishes.

If you are interested in exploring Lee, check out a state park, such as October Mountain State Forest.

We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Chambery Inn as you experience everything Lee has to offer.

hotel_one_review: Located in Downtown, this enchanting business-friendly hotel offers spacious rooms, a coffee shop and a fitness center.
description: The Godfrey Hotel Boston has always been a leader in cleanliness. That is why we have received the coveted AAA Inspector’s Best of Housekeeping award every year since we opened our doors. But times have changed and immaculate is no longer good enough. That is why The Godfrey Hotel has introduced a new standard of cleaning, Beyond Immaculate: Next Generation Sanitation. In addition to the measures indicated here, The Godfrey is taking a number of other measures including virus killing UV lights installed in public space ventilation systems and electrostatic sanitizer spray in guest rooms and public spaces.

hotel_one_review: Casual contemporary rooms in a scenic family-friendly hotel located in Back Bay offering a fitness center, a concierge and breakfast.
description: The “Grand Dame” of Boston has missed you all, and we are thrilled to welcome our friends, family and community back into our historic hotel. As always, caring for you is our top priority. To learn more about the extensive measures we are taking to safeguard, protect and care for our valued guests and employees, visit ALLSafeandWell.com.

hotel_one_review: Metropolitan mid-priced hotel in Brighton offering sleek contemporary rooms with a restaurant, fitness classes and wifi.
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Boston? Then look no further than Studio Allston Hotel, a charming hotel that brings the best of Boston to your doorstep.

You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and you can stay connected during your stay as Studio Allston Hotel offers guests free wifi.

Plus, Studio Allston Hotel offers a fitness center and an on-site restaurant, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, parking is available.

Close to some of Boston's most popular landmarks, such as Fenway Park (2.3 mi) and Commonwealth Avenue Mall (2.4 mi), Studio Allston Hotel is a great destination for tourists.

While in Boston be sure to experience local shrimp favorites at Top of the Hub, Atlantic Fish Company, or Abe & Louie's.

There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular art galleries such as The Art of Paul Pedulla, SoWa Artists Guild, and International Poster Gallery.

We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Studio Allston Hotel as you experience everything Boston has to offer.

hotel_name: The Mansion at Ocean Edge Resort & Golf Club
hotel_one_review: Idyllic upmarket hotel offering ocean-view rooms, a beach and a rooftop bar.
description: Contact us directly at Ocean Edge for best rates. Choose from 90 luxuriously appointed guestrooms or two- or three-bedroom Presidential Bay Collection. While the entire resort is open for your pleasure, the AAA Four Diamond Rated Mansion-side offers a bounty of amenities just footsteps from your room: The Beach House Spa at Ocean Edge, private beach and new Beach Bar, outdoor and indoor pools, a tennis complex staffed by professionals, a cardio/weight room and fitness studio, and a spa treatment room. Please note that some of our amenities including our Beach Bar and kayaking and paddleboarding on Blueberry Pond are seasonal.

hotel_one_review: Located in Back Bay, this romantic mid-range hotel with airy chic rooms offers a rooftop bar, a rooftop pool and evening entertainment.
description: The Colonnade Hotel has provided thoughtful hospitality to Boston visitors and residents for more than 40 years. A dynamic Back Bay landmark whose opening launched the neighborhood's renaissance in the early seventies, The Colonnade is home to the city's only outdoor Roof Top Pool and the award-winning Parisian-style restaurant, Brasserie JO. The property boasts 285 sophisticated guest rooms, including nine luxury suites. Ideally located, The Colonnade is in close proximity to Newbury Street, The Shops at Prudential Center, Hynes Convention Center, Northeastern and many of Boston's finest museums, galleries, and iconic sites including Symphony Hall and Fenway Park. The Colonnade Hotel is a member of the Preferred Hotel's LIFESTYLE collection. Preferred Hotels represents over 650 of the world's finest luxury hotels and resorts with an extensive global collection in more than 85 countries.

hotel_one_review: Located in West End, this welcoming business-friendly hotel with contemporary rooms offers an outdoor pool, a concierge and a bar.
description: The Wyndham Boston at Beacon Hill, the finest in downtown Boston hotels, is perfectly situated at the base of Beacon Hill, the city's most historic neighborhood. Stay in touch at our Boston airport hotel with complimentary high-speed Internet access in all guest rooms. For delicious dining,The Dean's List, a standout option among Beacon Hill restaurants. Host your event or meeting at one of the best hotels in Boston, featuring 5,800 square feet of function space. Enjoy our newly-renovated Beacon Hill hotel's close proximity to attractions and historic sights. Watch the Bruins or the Celtics at TD Banknorth Garden and head to Faneuil Hall/Quincy Market for unique shopping. As one of the most ideally-located of Beacon Hill hotels near TD Banknorth Garden, we are a short walk to the Financial District, and next door to Massachusetts General Hospital and Boston Shriners Hospital. With two MBTA subway stops nearby, the city is easily accessible. Take the Green Line to visit Fenway Park or the Red Line to Harvard Square.

Offering a central spot for exploring the North Shore of Boston and located in the heart of Salem village in the town's pedestrian mall, The Hotel Salem is a quick stroll to boutiques and novelty shops, and a short drive to numerous attractions and activities.

hotel_one_review: Picturesque family-friendly hotel featuring bay-view rooms, beach access and free breakfast.
description:
We are looking forward to having our guests enjoy our Inn, the beautiful view of the harbor and everything Scituate has to offer!   Our top priority has always been the safety and well being of our guests and our staff.  To that end, in addition to the protocols we have always had in place and will continue, we have added some new measures for the current circumstances to ensure to the best of our ability, that we can deliver  a comfortable, safe, and secure stay.  

There will be new enhancements and changes to our usual operations for both our guests and our staff.  

At this time, the state of Massachusetts is requiring everyone to wear a mask (or cloth covering) while inside and outside of public spaces, unless you can maintain 6 feet of distance.  We are following state guidelines and best practices very carefully and as we learn new information; we will update our policies as needed.

As we move through this new way of traveling, our goal is to provide you with a wonderful stay!

hotel_one_review: Mid-range hotel featuring city-view rooms with a rooftop terrace, a rooftop bar and evening entertainment.
description:
Our Commitment to You. Our Commitment to Clean.

As we welcome you, we are committed to providing you with a safe environment that aligns with expert protocols working to defeat COVID-19. Consisting of in-house and outside experts in food and water safety, hygiene and infection prevention, and hotel operations, our team is redefining our cleaning and safety standards. We will continue to monitor and evolve our solutions to ensure a continued focus on the health and safety of our guests and associates.

hotel_one_review: Charming business-friendly hotel offering a fitness center, bike rentals and free breakfast.
description: Overlooking the picturesque rolling hills of Groton, MA, just 35 miles from Boston, The Groton Inn opened its doors in May 2018 to regain its stature as one of the most prominent lodging establishments in New England. America’s oldest inn, the original structure (circa 1678) was destroyed by fire in 2011 and has been meticulously re-imagined as a new 60-room hotel – echoing a legacy of three centuries of gracious hospitality while featuring modern amenities and world class service.

hotel_one_review: Pleasant eco-friendly hotel offering serene inviting rooms with a picnic area, free breakfast and an outdoor pool.
description: Garden Gables Inn is committed to making your stay enjoyable, healthy and safe. We are implementing all required federal, state and local health and safety guidelines, and also adopting additional industry best practices, including the guidelines of the SafeStayTM initiative of the American Hospitality and Lodging Association. All guests are required to wear masks or other appropriate facial coverings, and follow recommended social distancing protocols in the public areas of the Inn. Staff will wear masks at all times, and also gloves when cleaning public and guest rooms. We have hand sanitizer available and encourage its use. We have modified operations, such as breakfast service and housekeeping. We will still offer our made-to-order breakfast, but have eliminated the breakfast buffet. Daily housekeeping will be done during your stay, only with special arrangement. For additional information please contact us or visit our website: www.gardengablesinn.com.

description:
Effective August 1, 2020, per the Commonwealth of Massachusetts Covid-19 response, anyone entering Massachusetts from other states will be required to fill out a new "Massachusetts Travel Form" and quarantine for two weeks unless they can produce a negative result from a COVID-19 test administered no more than 72-hours before they arrived in the state. Individuals coming from low-risk states are exempt. Those states include New York, New Jersey, Connecticut, Maine, Vermont, New Hampshire and Hawaii.
Other limited exemptions apply to those who are just passing through Massachusetts, commuting across state lines for work, those arriving here for medical treatment, military personnel traveling under orders and those who are traveling for work in essential services.

hotel_one_review: Welcoming business-friendly hotel with a breakfast buffet, free wifi and a fitness center.
description: The BEST WESTERN Rockland is perfectly located between historic Boston and Cape Cod on Route 3, ideal for business & leisure travelers, a home away from home. Now Under New Ownership & Management. Newly Renovated Lobby, Public Areas, Fitness Center with Brand New Equipment & Serving Hot/Continental Breakfast, Flat Screen TVs. Our Hotel is minutes from the Braintree Red Line Subway Station, The Hanover Mall & Derby Street Mall are within 3 miles. Area attractions nearby include the New England Aquarium, Fenway Park, the Freedom Trail, JFK Library, Museum of Science and Faneuil Hall Marketplace, one of America's most famous shopping and dining experiences, Harbor Cruises & Whale Watching, Boston Plymouth Plantation, Boston National Historical Park, South Shore Plaza In Braintree, Wrentham Factory Shopping Outlet, Birth Place & Home of John Adams in Quincy. For that avid golfer, there are many golf clubs in the area such as Rockland Golf course, Pembroke Country Club and Scituate Country Club to name a few. Several malls, shops, restaurants and cocktail lounges are located in the immediate vicinity. A perfect way to start your day is with our complimentary full hot breakfast with a choice of hot items, eggs, yogurt, fresh fruit, cereal and more, including hot waffle flavors! Our hotel provides business travelers with conveniences like access to copy and fax services. Our Mayflower Meeting room accommodates up to 60 people ideal for meetings & conferences. We are in close proximity to Assinippi Industrial Park and Hingham Corporate Center. All spacious guest rooms include irons, ironing boards, hair dryers, coffee makers and cable television. Microwaves and refrigerators are in some rooms. We are 100% Smoke Free & are in a continuous effort to be so. Harvard, Cambridge MIT, Stonehill College, Bridgewater State College, Milton Academy, are major educational area attractions. For an unforgettable adventure, book a stay at the BEST WESTERN Rockland today. General Hotel Information: Check-In: 3PM (15:00) Check-Out: 11AM (11:00) Hotel Ratings: AAA-2 Diamond Pet Policy: Pets not accepted. More> Guest Rooms: null Cable satellite television with HBO® AM/FM alarm clock Coffee/tea maker Microwave available More Area Information: 3.00 mile(s) from Derby Street Mall 7.00 mile(s) from John Adams Birthplace, President's birthplace and home 9.00 mile(s) from Nantasket Beach 11.00 mile(s) from South Shore Plaza, shopping mall 12.00 mile(s) from JFK Library, portrays life, leadership and legacy of President Kennedy More.

description: Yankee Inn is a landmark hotel in the beautifully serene Berkshire Hills of Lenox, MA. The Yankee Inn is cozy and private enough for a romantic getaway, but also accommodating and accessible enough for a family vacation. Our staff works above and beyond to cater to your needs and provide the exact experience you want. The Main Building houses our lobby, cocktail lounge, indoor pool and guest rooms, which included original and newly built hotel rooms. Our South Building maintains the motel style of the original motor lodge, housing smaller and more economical rooms. We provide a complimentary breakfast every morning, leaving you more time to spend skiing or sightseeing. You can also book an in-room massage for ultimate relaxation. Whatever your vacation desires are, we can help you plan the perfect stay. Yankee Inn is your next vacation destination. Book a room with us today and let's get started planning your perfect getaway!

hotel_one_review: Contemporary rooms in a tranquil business-friendly hotel with breakfast, a game room and a fitness center.
description: Thank you for considering our location for your travels! Our hotel is currently open and taking precautions for yours and others safety; such as, mandatory face masks for staff, floors marked for social distancing, hand sanitizer available to guests and staff in high touch point area, contactless check-in and check-out / mobile key available for Marriott Bonvoy members, staff required to regularly wash hands, regularly sanitizing high-traffic areas, individually wrapped toiletries, grab and go breakfast daily from 7am-9am, social distancing dining tables, inside and outside seating. For more details please feel free to contact guest services directly at 413-644-3200.

hotel_one_review: Modern business-friendly hotel with a fitness center, a convenience store and a breakfast buffet.
description:
A Cleaner Stay from Check-in to Check-Out
Hilton has partnered with RB, makers of Lysol® & Dettol®*, to help deliver an even cleaner stay for our guests with the Hilton CleanStay program. Building on our already rigorous cleaning standards, the program includes:

-Hilton CleanStay Room Seal to indicate that guest rooms haven’t been accessed since they were cleaned
-Extra disinfection of top 10 high touch areas in guest rooms including light switches and door handles
-Increased cleaning frequency of public areas and fitness centers
-Guest-accessible disinfecting wipes at entrances and high traffic areas
-Enhanced cleaning & other changes to buffets, in-room dining and meeting spaces
-Industry-leading contactless check-in and check-out with Digital Key at more than 4,700 properties globally

Our promise is to deliver the same level of reliable and friendly service you’d expect from Hilton, but with the added confidence of industry-leading hygiene practices created to keep you safe.

hotel_one_review: Quiet business-friendly hotel with a breakfast buffet, a pool and bike rentals.
description: We are committed to offering an environment that aligns with expert protocols for working to defeat COVID-19. Consisting of in-house and outside experts in food and water safety, hygiene and infection prevention, and hotel operations, our Marriott Cleanliness Council is redefining our cleaning and safety standards. Starting with our public spaces and high-traffic areas, Marriott is going above and beyond our normal protocols. We are cleaning surfaces with increased frequency, dedicated staff, and recommended cleaning agents. Marriott has elevated our rigorous protocols to thoroughly clean all surfaces with hospital-grade disinfectants. We will be placing disinfectant wipes in rooms. Hand sanitizing stations are being installed at hotel entrances, at our front desks, our elevator banks, and meeting spaces. Signage in public spaces will remind Marriott guests to maintain social distancing. Read more about Marriott’s Commitment to Clean by visiting https://clean.marriott.com/.

hotel_one_review: Quiet business-friendly hotel featuring contemporary rooms with free wifi, free breakfast and an outdoor pool.
description: Sonesta is committed to providing a safe and secure environment for our guests, visitors and employees. Working with our primary partner, Ecolab, we have created Stay Safe with Sonesta – a program that exceeds all CDC, WHO, and governmental requirements and recommendations related to the Coronavirus pandemic. This program will evolve as we continue to update our procedures and protocols to ensure our standards maintain the most relevant levels of protection for our guests and employees. Hotel team members have received training to ensure they are ready to deliver at the higher standards we’ve set including the following areas: Guest Protection & Social Distancing Cleanliness & Disinfection Protocols Employee Safety & Preparedness Guest Room Modifications for Safety Group & Meeting Space Protocols Sonesta is a participant in the Safe Stay initiative created by the American Hotel & Lodging Association. sonesta.com/staysafe

hotel_name: Best Western Plus Berkshire Hills Inn & Suites
hotel_one_review: Quiet eco-friendly hotel featuring hiking, a breakfast buffet and a fitness center.
description: The BEST WESTERN Berkshire Hills Inn & Suites proudly offers 59 spaciously appointed guest rooms each complete with microwave, refrigerator, 37-inch LCD television with HBO® and high-speed Internet access. Guests will wake each morning to a delicious complimentary hot breakfast. This Berkshire hotel's additional amenities include an exercise facility, whirlpool suites and fireplace suites. Business travelers will appreciate the quality meeting facilities as well as our business center.

hotel_one_review: Restored city-view rooms in an enchanting business-friendly hotel with a restaurant, a hot tub and racquetball.
description: Nestled along the scenic Quinebaug River, The Southbridge Hotel and Conference Center combines evocative architecture and modern amenities with new millennium technology to create an incomparable destination for productive meetings or some well-deserved leisure. Our guests will enjoy well-appointed executive guest rooms, including 4 suites Rooms, with wireless high-speed internet access, refrigerator, coffee maker, hairdryers, iron/ironing board, cable TV and bath amenities. We offer an extensive range of recreational facilities, including Focus Fitness Center; equipped with a heated indoor pool, Jacuzzi, sauna, racquet ball courts, game room and jogging trails. Shades Lounge offers beverages and casual fare. Our convenient location; less than one-hour drive to Boston or Hartford is near shopping, sightseeing and antiquing in Old Sturbridge Village

hotel_one_review: Quiet mid-range hotel with free breakfast, in-room kitchenettes and free wifi.
description: Free grab-and-go breakfast: Jumpstart your day with a free grab-and-go breakfast that includes a variety of breakfast bars and muffins, hot cereal, coffee, and tea.

hotel_one_review: Charming family-friendly hotel offering grand rooms, a restaurant and a pool.
description:
If you’re looking for a family-friendly hotel in Sturbridge, look no further than Publick House Historic Inn.

While staying at Publick House Historic Hotel, visitors can check out Hyland Orchard & Rapscallion Brewery (2.4 mi), which is a popular Sturbridge attraction.

Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.

Publick House Historic Inn features a 24 hour front desk, a gift shop, and a coffee shop, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and breakfast. If you are driving to Publick House Historic Inn, free parking is available.

While in Sturbridge, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Publick House Historic Inn, including Sturbridge Seafood (0.8 mi), Oxhead Tavern (0.9 mi), and B.T.'s Smokehouse (1 mi).

Should time allow, Old Sturbridge Village is a popular attraction that is 1.5 miles away.

The staff at Publick House Historic Inn looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

hotel_one_review: Panoramic mid-range hotel featuring elegant city-view rooms with a fitness center, a patio and a restaurant.
description: As a proud Hyatt Hotel, we are following Hyatt's Clean & Cleanliness Guidelines, visit our website for more information: https://bit.ly/HyattClean In addition, we have been awarded AAA Best of Housekeeping Award which reflects the strong sense of cleanliness of our hotel!

hotel_name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Boston Somerville
hotel_one_review: Tranquil business-friendly hotel offering contemporary rooms, a breakfast buffet and a fitness center.
description:
See why so many travelers make La Quinta Inn & Suites Boston Somerville their hotel of choice when visiting Somerville. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a quiet setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.

La Quinta Inn & Suites Boston Somerville Hotel is a quiet hotel offering a flat screen TV and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.

The hotel features a 24 hour front desk. Plus, guests can enjoy a fitness center and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Somerville. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.

Close to some of Somerville's most popular landmarks, such as Massage Institute of New England (1.3 mi) and Artisan's Asylum (1.3 mi), La Quinta Inn & Suites Boston Somerville is a great destination for tourists.

While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the pubs, including Legal on the Mystic, Tony C's Sports Bar and Grill, and Winter Hill Brewing, all of which are a short distance from Somerville La Quinta.

Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular art museums, such as Museum of Bad Art and Somerville Museum.

We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at La Quinta Inn & Suites Boston Somerville as you experience all of the things Somerville has to offer.

hotel_one_review: Metropolitan mid-priced hotel in Seaport District offering sleek rooms, bike rentals and a rooftop bar.
description:
At YOTEL our guests’ health and well-being and exceptionally high standards of cleanliness and hygiene have always been a core part of our brand.
For peace of mind and to enhance protection and care for our guests and crew from check-in to check-out, we have implemented operation ‘#SmartStay’; a package of measures, resources and training that’s being rolled out at every one of our hotels worldwide. 
In summary we are:
•	Increasing the frequency of cleaning with high-grade disinfectants on all high-touch surfaces, cabins and shared spaces
•	Implementing enhanced safety and hygiene protocols for our restaurants, cafes, bars and Grab+Go including food preparation and handling 
•	Installing hand sanitiser stations throughout the hotel in both public and back of hours areas for both guests and crew 
•	Displaying social distancing reminders in busy areas 
All our crew are fully trained on ‘#SmartStay’ and are here to answer any questions you may have about the programme.

hotel_one_review: Scenic eco-friendly hotel offering bay-view rooms with billiards, a bar and a hot tub.
description: OVERLOOKING LEWIS BAY! We are a Friendly, Fun, Relaxing resort. We have received awards for our Hospitality, Customer Care, and Cleanliness. We're not just a place to stay, we're your home base for a fantastic, exciting Cape Cod Vacation! Whether you need a quiet and relaxing romantic getaway, or a memorable family vacation, the Bayside is perfect anytime of year.We are located close to Beaches, Restaurants, Shopping, and Cape Cod Attractions. For golfers, there are 20 golf courses within 20 minutes! For explorers, we are a short drive to Provincetown, the National Seashore, Falmouth, and a ferry ride to Nantucket and Martha's Vineyard. For families, we are close to amusements, mini golf, whale watching, boat & kayak rentals, movies, trampolines, and much more.

hotel_one_review: Welcoming mid-range hotel featuring contemporary rooms with a pool, a bar and free wifi.
description: Located near downtown Boston and only eight miles from Logan International Airport, Hyatt Place Boston/Medford is the ideal choice for casual travelers visiting Bean Town. Our beautifully designed accommodations and travel enhancing amenities create a seamless experience, so you have the simple essentials on your own time. Enjoy modern conveniences and up-close access to our vibrant city.

hotel_one_review: Enchanting business-friendly hotel offering striking contemporary rooms with a water park, a restaurant and a pool.
description: Located in the heart of historic Plymouth, on the site of the original Pilgrim settlement and steps from attractions. Featuring 80 spacious rooms and luxury fireplace suites with oversized whirlpool; exclusive Pilgrim Cove Indoor Theme Pool with 80’ water slide, waterfalls, lap lanes and soothing whirlpool. Enjoy the award-winning Hearth ‘n Kettle Restaurant and Tavern, the unique atmosphere and delicious fare at the WaterFire Tavern and indulge at the full service Spa. Reseve direct for the lowest rate.

hotel_name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Springfield MA
hotel_one_review: Contemporary rooms in an urban family-friendly hotel with a pool, a game room and a bar.
description: La Quinta Inn & Suites Springfield Hotel, Massachusetts is the ideal location for family fun or a business excursion. Located at the junction of I-91 and I-291 in Downtown Springfield, guests are just minutes away from some of Western Massachusetts greatest claims to fame: Dr. Seuss Memorial Sculpture Garden, the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame, and Six Flags New England. Smith & Wesson, MassMutual, Big Y, corporate offices are just minutes from the hotel. All overnight rooms include a full hot breakfast buffet served 6am - 10am daily; complimentary parking & wi-fi and use of our heated indoor pool and extensive fitness room. Our lobby restaurant offers a delicious meal and cold cocktails just an elevator ride from your room. Group blocks and banquet & meeting space available by calling the hotel Sales Department. We look forward to welcoming you on your visit to Springfield. We appreciate the opportunity to serve you.

hotel_name: Red Roof PLUS+ Boston - Woburn/ Burlington
hotel_one_review: Contemporary rooms in a welcoming mid-range hotel with free parking, free internet and in-room air conditioning.
description: Red Roof PLUS+ Boston - Woburn/ Burlington is one of the best 100% smoke-free budget hotels in Woburn, MA that is located off of I-95 and I-93 as well as 1.5 miles from Anderson Station to take you into the heart of downtown Boston. We are also near Woburn Mall, Burlington Mall, Stone Zoo, Crest View Plaza, Faneuil Research Hall, Boston Duck Tours, the New England Aquarium, the Boston Science Center, Harvard University, Boston College, Tufts University, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Northeastern University, Fenway Park, the Opera House, Lahey Clinic, Winchester Hospital, Boston Children’s Hospital, Brigham and Women’s Hospital and Logan International Airport (BOS). We offer our guests free Verified Wi-Fi and a free expanded cable package featuring HBO. Upgrade to one of our Premium rooms where we will have a snack ready for you in your room! This hotel offers ample parking for tour buses and large trucks. Red Roof PLUS+ Boston - Woburn/ Burlington is a pet-friendly hotel.

hotel_name: Days Inn by Wyndham Great Barrington
hotel_one_review: Tranquil value hotel offering free wifi, free breakfast and skiing.
description: We are a small 63 room hotel that has so much to offer. We are a short 1 block walk to the heart of the downtown area, where you can catch film or show and the Mahaiwe, or try one of the very many different restaurants. We offer Free Continental Breakfast and the coffee is always hot. Free WiFi and a large parking area if your traveling with a large van or truck or even pulling a trailer. If your looking to ski we are only 5 minutes to Butternut and 10 minutes to Catamount. If your looking to just relax on the Tanglewood lawn we can have you there in 25 minutes. We have many different hikes we can guide you in the direction of and if speed is more your thing we can offer you direction to Lime Rock Park which is about 40 minutes or less away or dirt track racing at Lebanon Valley that is a short hour drive. When we say we are in the Heart of the Berkshires we mean it. Hope to seer you soon

hotel_one_review: Lovely business-friendly hotel featuring bay-view rooms, a beach and a restaurant.
description: The Nantasket Beach Resort is a full service beachfront resort located directly across from one of New England's top beaches. The resort features a heated indoor pool, hot tub and rooftop deck offering up spectacular views of the Atlantic. The rooms and suites at the Nantasket Beach Resort have been beautifully renovated and come fully equipped with modern amenities. The resort is also home to The Paragon Grill, a seasonal full-service restaurant and lounge, which serves exquisite coastal cuisine in a casual setting. In addition to three miles of pristine beach, guests will find an endless number of nearby activities including boat charters, sunset cruises, fishing, sailing, kayaking, biking, arcades and miniature golf just to name a few. For scenic hiking near Hull, the resort is located within 15 minutes of the trails at Wompatuck State Park, World's End, and the Whitney and Thayer Woods.

hotel_one_review: Welcoming business-friendly hotel in Back Bay featuring airy low-key rooms with in-room air conditioning, free internet and a coffee shop.
description: Welcome to Hotel 140. As a charming and intimate boutique residence, we offer a surprisingly affordable pied-a-terre in a neighborhood known for its pricey hotels. Located in Boston’s historic Back Bay, we’re a stylish newcomer in the heart of one of the country’s oldest and most captivating cities. Housed within a historic landmark building on Clarendon Street, our beautiful boutique hotel delights arriving guests with its graceful neoclassical architecture, contemporary services and amenities, and easy access to Back Bay Station. Listed on the National Register of Historic Places, our exquisite building was constructed in 1929 as the home for the oldest YWCA in the country. We continue to enchant with distinguishing design touches like our bright, bustling two-story lobby, terrazzo floors, arched windows and tufted sofas and wingback chairs. And with immediate neighbors the Lyric Stage Theater Company and Viga Eatery, we ensure that you will always be entertained and well fed.

description: The BEST WESTERN Springfield West Inn is located on the Connecticut River just two miles from downtown Springfield. The location makes it easy to get to local destinations since we're located near the intersection of I-91 and I-90, less than 30 minutes from Bradley International Airport. The hotel's setting in West Springfield, MA is perfect for business travelers. Guests staying at the hotel have access to multiple large businesses like MassMutual Life Insurance Company, Smith & Wesson(R) and Baystate Health. If leisure is the reason for your stay, the hotel's location near Six Flags(R) New England, one of the largest theme parks in the region, is just five miles away. The Basketball Hall of Fame also calls Springfield, MA home. The hotel's property is three miles radius to the MassMutual Center, which hosts many concerts and events. Eastern States Exposition is nearby which features horse shows, trade shows like EASTEC(R), and "The Big E."

hotel_one_review: Located in West End, this intimate business-friendly hotel with warm contemporary rooms offers bikes for guests, a fitness center and a restaurant.
