description: Red Roof PLUS+ Boston - Framingham is one of the best 100% smoke-free budget hotels in Framingham, MA that is right off of I-90 and just 18 miles from downtown Boston. We are also near many historical attractions like the Lexington and Concord Battlefields, Faneuil Hall / Quincy Market, the Paul Revere House, New England Aquarium, Freedom Trail Tours, Fenway Park, TD Garden, Cochituate State Park, Natick Mall, American Girl Store Boston, LEGOLAND Discovery Center Boston, Longfellow’s Wayside Inn and Logan International Airport (BOS). Our hotel is close to a mecca of college and universities like Framingham State University, Wellesley College, Boston College, Boston University, Brandeis University, Bentley College, Harvard, MIT, Northeastern University, Olin College, Regis College and many more. There are many world headquarters close by such as TJX, Bose, Staples, Math Works and Genzyme, just to name a few. We offer our guests free Verified Wi-Fi and a free expanded cable package featuring HBO. Upgrade to one of our Premium rooms where we will have a snack box ready for you in your room! Red Roof PLUS+ Boston - Framingham is a pet-friendly hotel.

hotel_one_review: Tranquil family-friendly hotel featuring a fitness center, free wifi and breakfast.
description: Stay in the heart of Worcester at the Holiday Inn Express Worcester Downtown. Enjoy a central location within walking distance from shops, restaurants, and entertainment venues. Catch a hockey game at the DCU Center, view a concert at the Worcester Palladium, or see a show at the Mechanics Hall and Hanover Theatre, all just steps from our hotel.A host of extra amenities await you at our Holiday Inn Express Worcester Downtown. Stay in touch with family and friends with free internet access in all guest rooms and public areas. Enjoy our complimentary Express Start breakfast every morning. With the fitness center and business center, it's easy to keep fit and on top of business on the road. Relax in a guest room and get a fantastic night's sleep on the clean and fresh bed. Host your next business meeting or social event in one of our meeting rooms and enjoy audio/visual equipment.

hotel_name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Boston - Andover
hotel_one_review: Welcoming business-friendly hotel offering contemporary rooms with darts, a bar and a hot tub.
description:
A Cleaner Stay from Check-in to Check-Out
Hilton has partnered with RB, makers of Lysol® & Dettol®*, to help deliver an even cleaner stay for our guests with the Hilton CleanStay program. Building on our already rigorous cleaning standards, the program includes:

-Hilton CleanStay Room Seal to indicate that guest rooms haven’t been accessed since they were cleaned
-Extra disinfection of top 10 high touch areas in guest rooms including light switches and door handles
-Increased cleaning frequency of public areas and fitness centers
-Guest-accessible disinfecting wipes at entrances and high traffic areas
-Enhanced cleaning & other changes to buffets, in-room dining and meeting spaces
-Industry-leading contactless check-in and check-out with Digital Key at more than 4,700 properties globally

Our promise is to deliver the same level of reliable and friendly service you’d expect from Hilton, but with the added confidence of industry-leading hygiene practices created to keep you safe.

description: We are pleased to announce our re opening date as June 18th and  we would like to assure all of our upcoming guests that we will be adhering to all State and local guidelines for protecting both guests and staff. Not limited to, all staff wearing face masks, and conducting physical distancing, disinfection of all rooms, common areas and dining room between guests with both EPA approved foggers, and frequent flat service cleaning  with approved cleaning products. Sanitizing stations are conveniently located though out the property.  A more comprehensive list will be shared soon.

hotel_name: New Bedford Harbor Hotel, an Ascend Hotel Collection Member
hotel_one_review: Family-friendly hotel with a fitness center, a bar and free wifi.
description:
Looking for a place to stay in New Bedford? Then look no further than New Bedford Harbor Hotel, an Ascend Hotel Collection Member, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of New Bedford to your doorstep.

Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, and guests can go online with free internet access offered by the hotel.

The property also features a fitness center and free breakfast to make your visit even more pleasant.

Nearby landmarks such as Subtext Book Shop (0.0 mi) and Gallery65 on William (0.1 mi) make New Bedford Harbor Hotel, an Ascend Hotel Collection Member a great place to stay when visiting New Bedford.

When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Spicy Lime, Ming Sushi and Steakhouse, and Mee Hong Restaurant, which are some Asian restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.

Should time allow, New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park, Seamen's Bethel, and Rotch-Jones-Duff House and Garden Museum are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.

We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at New Bedford Harbor Hotel, an Ascend Hotel Collection Member as you experience everything New Bedford has to offer.

hotel_one_review: Welcoming eco-friendly hotel offering contemporary rooms, a bar and a fitness center.
description: The Hyatt Place Boston/Braintree is an upscale, modern hotel in the heart of the South Shore. Located only 20 minutes from downtown Boston, the hotel features 204 king and double bedded guestrooms, 5 meeting/banquet rooms and a spacious, aesthetically pleasing gallery lobby. The gallery lobby is made up of the cafe offering Starbucks specialty coffee drinks, limited bar menu and 24 hr. food availability; the e-room offering 3 computers with print, copy and fax services including remote printing from your guest room; the great room offering plenty of flexible, comfortable seating to relax. Ideally located in North Braintree at the intersection of Route 93 to Boston and Route 3 to the south shore and Cape Cod, the hotel is only 1 to 3 miles away from large office parks. The hotel is also in walking distance to the South Shore Plaza shopping mall (offering over 300 shops and restaurants) and conveniently located close to the Quincy T (Red line) and Boston Logan Express.

hotel_one_review: Picturesque family-friendly hotel offering a breakfast buffet, a concierge and a hot tub.
description: We are committed to offering an environment that aligns with expert protocols for working to defeat COVID-19. Consisting of in-house and outside experts in food and water safety, hygiene and infection prevention, and hotel operations, our Marriott Cleanliness Council is redefining our cleaning and safety standards. Starting with our public spaces and high-traffic areas, Marriott is going above and beyond our normal protocols. We are cleaning surfaces with increased frequency, dedicated staff, and recommended cleaning agents. Marriott has elevated our rigorous protocols to thoroughly clean all surfaces with hospital-grade disinfectants. We will be placing disinfectant wipes in rooms. Hand sanitizing stations are being installed at hotel entrances, at our front desks, our elevator banks, and meeting spaces. Signage in public spaces will remind Marriott guests to maintain social distancing. Read more about Marriott’s Commitment to Clean by visiting https://clean.marriott.com/.

hotel_one_review: Quaint premium hotel featuring bay-view rooms, a tennis court and a restaurant.
description: Travelers from COVID-19 lower-risk States are not required to fill out the Massachusetts Travel Form and do not need to quarantine. States are included on the list based on meeting two criteria: average daily cases per 100K below 6 AND positive test rate below 5%, both measured as a 7-day rolling average. Data is from covidexitstrategy.org as of July 21, 2020. Visit Mass.gov for more information. The current list of COVID-19 lower-risk states includes: (Note: Effective Friday, August 7, Rhode Island is no longer listed as a lower-risk state) Connecticut Hawaii Maine New Hampshire New Jersey New York Vermont

hotel_name: Aiden by Best Western @ Cape Point
hotel_one_review: Quiet mid-range hotel offering a fitness center, a patio and a poolside bar.
description: Our newly renovated 116 guest rooms and suites are designed to facilitate a peaceful and productive experience including free high-speed wireless Internet and mini fridge. We offer complimentary Grab & Go breakfast. Our seasonal outdoor pool has a bar and light menu offering.

hotel_one_review: Colonial style mid-range hotel with free wifi, breakfast and a fitness center.
description:
Choice Hotels takes pride in its hotels’ long-standing dedication to cleanliness, including our 150+ point cleanliness checklist already on every housekeeping cart as part of the Room Condition & Cleanliness program.  

As part of the Commitment to Clean initiative, Choice Hotels has provided our franchisees additional educational resources - enhanced best practices and extensive cleaning, disinfecting, hygiene, and social distancing best practices and protocols - leveraging partnerships with industry leaders and providing hotels with the latest resources and training. 

In addition, every Choice-branded hotel will designate a “Commitment to Clean Captain,” who will complete best-in-class cleanliness training and will be responsible for incorporating the new protocols into their hotel’s operations. 

Choice is a signatory to the U.S. Travel Association’s Industry Guidelines to Ensure the Health and Safety of Travelers.

description:
La Quinta Inn & Suites Boston-Andover is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Andover, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.

Rooms at La Quinta Inn & Suites Andover Hotel provide a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.

In addition, while staying at Andover La Quinta guests have access to a 24 hour front desk and a convenience store. You can also enjoy an indoor pool and free breakfast. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at La Quinta Andover.

If you like lobster, La Quinta Inn & Suites Andover Hotel is conveniently located near 189 Prime, which is known for serving up this local favorite.

If you’re looking for something to do, Ward Reservation is a nice way to spend some time.

Enjoy your stay in Andover!

hotel_one_review: Striking rooms in a colonial style mid-priced hotel with a restaurant, a concierge and a fitness center.
description:
Welcome to Colonial Hotel, your Gardner “home away from home.” Colonial Hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.

For those interested in checking out Gardner Bicentennial Chair (2.0 mi) while visiting Gardner, Colonial Hotel is a short distance away.

As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.

Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and newspaper while staying at Colonial Hotel. In addition, Colonial Hotel offers a pool and a lounge, which will help make your Gardner trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.

If you like pubs, Colonial Hotel is conveniently located near Colonial Grille, Williams Restaurant, and Gardner Ale House.

If you’re looking for something to do, Dunn State Park is a nice way to spend some time.

Colonial Hotel puts the best of Gardner at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

hotel_one_review: Intimate eco-friendly hotel offering contemporary rooms with breakfast, table tennis and a heated pool.
description: We have always worked to make sure our guests enjoy a safe, peaceful and worry-free stay at Pleasant Bay Village Resort. We recognize that the COVID-19 virus has changed the world, and we are all affected by these changes. Cleanliness and safety remain a top priority for us. Remember, our spacious seven acre piece of paradise is also our home, and we take the spread of this virus very seriously. We have established COVID19 procedures and continue to monitor the requirements, guidance and recommendations from the local health department, State of Massachusetts and CDC which we may require adjustments as more information becomes available. Please check our website at https://www.pleasantbayvillage.com/ for more details or call the property directly.

hotel_one_review: Contemporary rooms in a welcoming family-friendly hotel with VIP room facilities, free internet and free parking.
description: 100% Non-Smoking Red Roof PLUS+ Boston - Logan is Newly Renovated and a great place to relax after seeing Boston's sights- Newbury Street, Boston Commons, Fenway Park, Quincy Market, Boston Harbor, The Freedom Trail, The North End, Back Bay, The New England Aquarium, The Swan Boats, The Museum of Fine Arts, The Science Museum, Harvard University, M.I.T, Tufts University, as well as other famous universities, and so much more. If you are traveling on business, we are just miles away from The Hynes Convention Center, The World Trade Center, Boston's Financial District and Boston Convention and Exhibit Center. If you are here on leisure, catch a concert or see the world famous Boston Celtics or Boston Bruins at TD Garden in Boston or head over to Fenway Park and see the Red Sox! Boston has plenty of fun to offer and in the historic Theatre District you will find several live performances nightly at the Orpheum Theatre, Citi Performing Arts Center, The Charles Playhouse and many others. The Red Roof Inn in Saugus is only 5 miles away from Revere Beach, America's 1st Public Beach as well as Suffolk Downs where you can see exciting horse races most of the year. Don't feel like driving into Boston? Don't worry, we are just 5 miles away from Wonderland T Station (subway) where you can park all day for a very low rate and take a quick 15 minute train ride into the city.

hotel_one_review: Mid-priced hotel featuring free wifi, a fitness center and a breakfast buffet.
description:
Welcome to Best Western Cape Cod Hotel, your Hyannis “home away from home.” Best Western Cape Cod Hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.

While staying at Comfort Inn Cape Cod Hotel, visitors can check out Chabad Jewish Center of Cape Cod (1.8 mi) and Hyannis Transportation Center (2.3 mi), some of Hyannis' top attractions.

Rooms at Hyannis Comfort Inn provide a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.

In addition, while staying at Best Western Cape Cod Hotel guests have access to a 24 hour front desk and newspaper. You can also enjoy a pool and breakfast. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Hyannis Comfort Inn.

If you like seafood restaurants, Hyannis Comfort Inn is conveniently located near Black Cat Tavern, Spanky's Clam Shack & Seaside Saloon, and Cooke's Seafood - Hyannis.

If you’re looking for something to do, Veterans Memorial Park is a nice way to spend some time.

Best Western Cape Cod Hotel puts the best of Hyannis at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

hotel_name: Red Roof PLUS+ Boston - Mansfield/ Foxboro
hotel_one_review: Value hotel featuring in-room air conditioning, a sun deck and free internet.
description: Our hotel is using EPA approved products that kill COVID-19.  Additional sanitation of those vital, high-touch points in common areas that impact guests and employees is being done up to four times per day. In our rooms, we are asking our hotel staff to be extra diligent in sanitizing guest rooms including TVs, remote controls, tables, doorknobs, light switches, desks, phones, keyboards, toilets, faucets and sinks. We are washing linen and towels in accordance with the Centers for Disease Control (CDC) guidelines. Dirty linen is bagged in the guest room to eliminate excess contact while being transported to the laundry facility. We have created lobby signs instructing guests to wear a face covering while in our facility. All of our employees and staff members are also following the CDC protective measures.

hotel_one_review: Quiet family-friendly hotel with free breakfast, free wifi and an outdoor pool.
description:
See why so many travelers make Howard Johnson by Wyndham Amherst Hadley their hotel of choice when visiting Hadley. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.

The rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Boston-Marlboro
hotel_one_review: Modern business-friendly hotel offering free breakfast, free wifi and a fitness center.
description: Come join us at the Holiday Inn Express in Hudson, built with every traveler in mind. From the corporate traveler to the family out on a little getaway, our many services and amenities delight all of our guests. Located just minutes from I-495, I-290 and the Massachusetts Turnpike, you will find something for everyone. Settled in central Massachusetts, not far from Boston, Worcester or Framingham, you can enjoy old-fashioned New England hospitality without missing out on the high-tech needs of today's world. The Holiday Inn Express Boston Marlboro provides top notch accommodations to an abundance of local corporate giants. Intel, HP, Boston Scientific, Lucent Technologies, IBM, Raytheon, & Fidelity Investments are all within a ten minute drive.Our hotel is also located among some of the finest golf courses in New England. From the International Golf Club to Charter Oaks Country Club, we have a course to fit just about everyone's taste and skill level. In just minutes from our front door, you can enjoy shopping at the Solomon Pond Mall, or you can catch a movie at a nearby Regal Cinemas with stadium seating. You will also find yourself just a short drive from Gillette Stadium, DCU Center as well as the New England Sports Center. Our hotel is a 100% smoke free facility.

hotel_one_review: Tranquil mid-priced hotel in Downtown offering in-room air conditioning, a breakfast buffet and free internet.
description: Built in 1877 as the Sumner Hotel in the heart of the Theatre District by respected architect Harris M. Stephenson (1845 - 1909), Found Boston is one of the oldest continuously operated hotels in Boston's downtown area. The hotel's enduring presence is due to a number of factors, but probably none as important as "location." An easy walk of just two or three blocks leads guests to such attractions as the historic Boston Common, the Public Garden, and numerous theaters, restaurants & clubs. For those wishing to venture out a bit further from the downtown area, The hotel is one block from the MBTA's Green Line - Boylston Street Station, gateway to outstanding cultural and historical attractions which make Boston one of the most popular destinations of domestic and foreign travelers. The hotel's reputation as Boston's "Best Value" is earned from affordable rates and exceptional amenities. So, whether on business or pleasure, the Milner Hotel offers you Boston's Best Location and Best Value. All rates include complimentary continental breakfast which includes juice, Lavazza coffee, assorted teas, yogurt, cereals, fresh whole fruit and freshly made waffles. Helpful tips: Tip #1: Please note that our address is 78 Charles Street SOUTH. There is also an address which is 78 Charles Street - that is NOT us. Tip #2: The hotel was previously known as the "Milner Hotel". If your taxi driver is not familiar with our new name, let them know that under prior ownership the hotel was called the "Milner Hotel" and they should quickly be able to find the hotel.

hotel_one_review: Sleek harbor-view rooms in a charming mid-priced hotel with beach access, free internet and free breakfast.
description: Indulge in the serenity of calm, sweeping shorelines without sacrificing the convenience of town. Just steps from the quaint beaches, restaurants and shops of beautiful Nantucket Island, the Veranda House Hotel Collection is the perfect starting point for your New England getaway. Spectacular vistas of Nantucket Harbor and our terraced gardens mingle fresh salt air with blossomed breezes. At The Veranda House, luxury awaits. Your relaxation is our priority. Enjoy a staff-served epicure-style breakfast, afternoon cookies and sparkling wine. We offer full concierge service to make your stay even more complete.

hotel_one_review: Intimate family-friendly hotel offering sleek park-view rooms with hiking, a gift shop and free breakfast.
description: In Downtown Newburyport the historical GARRISON INN Boutique Hotel stands as an icon of modern glamour and timeless elegance, providing an exceptional experience for discerning travelers. As a true luxury boutique hotel, we provide unparalleled amenities and distinguished personal services with a highly focused attention to detail. Set in the heart of Newburyport's historic city center, we are an established, downtown Landmark Hotel known around the world for our rich historic character, impeccable service, and urban sophistication. Come discover the many special touches that set us apart.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston Brookline Longwood Medical
hotel_one_review: Contemporary rooms in a business-friendly hotel with a heated pool, a breakfast buffet and a convenience store.
description: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston Brookline Longwood Medical is located less than a mile from Longwood Medical Area (complimentary shuttle),MBTA stop 5 mins. away - Brookline Village, close to all Boston attractions, Fenway Park, TD Garden,Boston University, near Harvard Medical School, Dana Farber,Beth Israel Hospital, featuring all-suite accommodations King Studio or King 1 Bedroom Suites with fold-out full-size sofa beds, 4(2) Bedroom Suites available with one King-bedded room, one Queen/Queen room/ two bathrooms and a common parlor/kitchenette area. Stay for a night, a week or year, both short-term and extended stay options available. The hotel is also within walking distances of Boston's Green-Line of the MBTA transit system. Brookline is one of the most sought-after suburbs in Boston area. Must-see sites nearby include Museum of Fine Arts, USS Constitution, Boston Public Garden,Freedom Trail, Faneuil Hall,Prudential Ctr. Shopping. Valet or Self- Parking for $35.00 per night.

hotel_one_review: Quaint mid-range boutique hotel in Back Bay featuring chic contemporary rooms with bike rentals, a coffee shop and a fitness center.
description: Welcome to The Inn @ St. Botolph, a luxury boutique hotel located in the shadow of the Prudential Center. With a keen nod to its namesake, the patron saint of travelers, The Inn @ St. Botolph in Boston's historic Back Bay wraps a wealth of luxuries in a tidy and affordable package for discerning travelers. Like its sister hotel, the internationally acclaimed XV Beacon, The Inn @ St. Botolph offers understated contemporary interiors graced with traditional styling and comfort.

hotel_one_review: Airy chic rooms in a romantic lavish hotel with free internet, beach access and free breakfast.
description: 21 Broad offers 27 bright, modern Nantucket hotel accommodations with luxury linens, blackout shades, and a variety of other amenities to appeal to the discerning traveler. A vitamin C shower makes for the perfect remedy for a long day of wandering around Nantucket's historic downtown. Located just two blocks from the Steamship Authority ferry terminal, 21 Broad is in the buzzing center of town.

hotel_one_review: Tranquil family-friendly hotel in Dorchester with breakfast, bowling and an outdoor pool.
description: Hotel With Pool, Convenient to Historic Downtown Boston Whether you want to lay by the pool or explore the area, enjoy it all at our Ramada Boston hotel near Fenway Park. Our hotel is just four miles from the bustling historic downtown area. Greet the morning with free continental breakfast, then check your email with free Wi-Fi Internet access. Take a refreshing dip in our seasonal outdoor salt-water pool. Our hotel offers guest laundry services, Park Before You Fly packages, and parking, shuttle service and in-room safes for a nominal fee. Handicapped-accessible rooms are available at our hotel in Boston, MA.

hotel_one_review: Located in South End, this trendy business-friendly hotel offers sleek rooms, a bar and a fitness center.
description:
We have amplified precautionary measures at our hotel as your safety is paramount to us. We take the utmost care to ensure every stay with us is safe, clean and comfortable.  We are happy to share that all public space surfaces are treated by FUZE Biotech, a safe, sustainable, and long-term solution to prevent and protect against infectious disease carrying pathogens in living environments.  

We will be practicing social distancing in all our public areas.

For the health, safety and well-being of our customers, associates and communities, we will refrain from providing daily housekeeping service and will restrict our team members from accessing your room during your stay.  We are offering different options for daily housekeeping, so please contact us for more details.

description: Free grab-and-go breakfast: Jumpstart your day with a free grab-and-go breakfast that includes a variety of breakfast bars and muffins, hot cereal, coffee, and tea.

hotel_one_review: Grand restored rooms in a quaint mid-range hotel with free breakfast, free wifi and a rooftop terrace.
description:
Kendall Hotel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Cambridge, offering a romantic environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.

Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and Kendall Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.

You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a concierge and room service. In addition, guests can enjoy free breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.

Nearby landmarks such as The Alchemist (0.4 mi) and Harvard University (1.8 mi) make Kendall Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Cambridge.

If you’re looking for an Italian restaurant, consider a visit to East Side Bar & Grill, Sulmona, or Amelia's Trattoria, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Kendall Hotel.

During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) (0.3 mi), MIT Museum (0.5 mi), and Charles River (0.2 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.

Enjoy your stay in Cambridge!

hotel_one_review: Tranquil family-friendly hotel featuring a bar, evening entertainment and a hot tub.
description: Cape Cod's premiere resort warmly invites you and your family to experience the charm of New England. Stroll through the antique shops in the quaint villages of Cape Cod, walk among the dunes and sample some of the finest "Chowdah" Cape Cod has to offer. Whale watching, day trips to the famous islands of Martha's Vineyard and Nantucket, fishing, bike riding, sailing and quiet moments await you here on Cape Cod while staying at The Cove at Yarmouth

hotel_one_review: Contemporary rooms in a budget hotel with a restaurant, a hot tub and shops.
description:
Howard Johnson by Wyndham Springfield is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Springfield, offering a budget friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.

Close to Smead Arena (2.6 mi), a popular Springfield landmark, Howard Johnson by Wyndham Springfield is a great destination for tourists.

As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.

Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and shops while staying at Howard Johnson by Wyndham Springfield. In addition, Howard Johnson by Wyndham Springfield offers a hot tub and free breakfast, which will help make your Springfield trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.

If you like Mexican restaurants, Howard Johnson Express Springfield Hotel is conveniently located near Frontera Grill and Taco Bell.

If you’re looking for something to do, Lake Lorraine State Park (0.8 mi) is a nice way to spend some time, and it is within walking distance of Howard Johnson by Wyndham Springfield.

Enjoy your stay in Springfield!

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston/Canton, MA
hotel_one_review: Noteworthy business-friendly hotel featuring contemporary rooms with a pool, a concierge and free breakfast.
description:
A Cleaner Stay from Check-in to Check-Out
Hilton has partnered with RB, makers of Lysol® & Dettol®*, to help deliver an even cleaner stay for our guests with the Hilton CleanStay program. Building on our already rigorous cleaning standards, the program includes:

-Hilton CleanStay Room Seal to indicate that guest rooms haven’t been accessed since they were cleaned
-Extra disinfection of top 10 high touch areas in guest rooms including light switches and door handles
-Increased cleaning frequency of public areas and fitness centers
-Guest-accessible disinfecting wipes at entrances and high traffic areas
-Enhanced cleaning & other changes to buffets, in-room dining and meeting spaces
-Industry-leading contactless check-in and check-out with Digital Key at more than 4,700 properties globally

Our promise is to deliver the same level of reliable and friendly service you’d expect from Hilton, but with the added confidence of industry-leading hygiene practices created to keep you safe.

hotel_one_review: Tranquil mid-priced hotel offering free wifi, a fitness center and a restaurant.
description: A note from IHG® Hotels & Resorts: When you’re ready to travel again, we’ll be ready to welcome you. As the world adjusts to new travel norms and expectations, we’re enhancing the experience for you – our hotel guests – by redefining cleanliness and supporting wellbeing throughout your stay. We are expanding our commitment to cleanliness by: • Using new science-led protocols and service measures by enhancing the IHG Way of Clean • Partnering with industry leading experts Cleveland Clinic, Ecolab and Diversey • Launching a global IHG Clean Promise These strengthened procedures are designed to give you greater confidence and hotel teams the protection needed. For more information, please visit https://www.ihg.com/content/us/en/customer-care/clean-promise.

description:
See why so many travelers make The Lakeside Inn their hotel of choice when visiting Wakefield. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.

The rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.

Best Western Lord Wakefield features a 24 hour front desk, 24 hour check-in, and express check-in and check-out. In addition, as a valued Best Western Wakefield guest, you can enjoy breakfast that is available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.

While in Wakefield be sure to experience local shrimp favorites at Sabatino's Restaurant or Artichokes.

If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Crystal Lake Park, which is a popular park amongst tourists.

We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at The Lakeside Inn as you experience all of the things Wakefield has to offer.

hotel_name: The Four Points by Sheraton Norwood Hotel & Conference Center
hotel_one_review: Tranquil mid-priced hotel featuring a breakfast buffet, free wifi and a hot tub.
description: The Four Points by Sheraton Norwood is between Boston and Providence and is easily accessible from both airports. We're near New England corporate offices and have 30 professional meeting rooms.

hotel_one_review: Service-centric first-rate hotel offering contemporary rooms with a breakfast buffet, a concierge and a fitness center.
description:
We are working diligently to ensure that our hotel continues to provide essential services in this challenging environment.

We take standards for hygiene and cleanliness very seriously; we are closely monitoring and following the CDC and WHO guidance regarding COVID-19, as well as guidance from local health authorities. Our health and safety measures include everything from handwashing hygiene, to hospital grade cleaning product specifications for guest room and common area cleaning procedures. If a colleague exhibits symptoms of COVID-19, they are instructed not to return to work and instead seek appropriate medical attention. Should a guest exhibit symptoms, our priority is to safely relocate them to a place where they may receive appropriate medical attention.
 
With the COVID-19 situation rapidly evolving, we recommend that all guests consult local authorities to understand the latest travel restrictions before they commence their travel.

hotel_one_review: Mid-priced hotel offering bay-view rooms with a poolside bar, a heated pool and a beach.
description: Located on 500 feet of private sandy beach on the warm waters of Nantucket Sound, Blue Water is the ideal resort for a family vacation, a romantic getaway, or an extended family gathering. The resort boasts 113 guest rooms and cottages, most with patio or balcony featuring stunning ocean and garden views. Offering food and beverage services in the dining room and lounge, as well as catering for private parties of up to 75 people. Also, our popular beach side Cabana Bar & Grill serves food and drink favorites during the summer season. In addition to the private beach, resort amenities include indoor and outdoor heated pools,basketball court, putting green, and game arcade. Kids’ Klub, a supervised children’s program is offered during summer season along with a full complement of family activities, bonfire nights, fun clowns, magic and pirate adventure weeks and musical entertainment throughout the summer season on a complimentary basis. Open from late April until late October.

description: We are committed to offering an environment that aligns with expert protocols for working to defeat COVID-19. hotel_one_review: Welcoming family-friendly hotel featuring contemporary rooms with a bar, a fitness center and beach access.
description:
A Cleaner Stay from Check-in to Check-Out
Hilton has partnered with RB, makers of Lysol® & Dettol®*, to help deliver an even cleaner stay for our guests with the Hilton CleanStay program. Building on our already rigorous cleaning standards, the program includes:

-Hilton CleanStay Room Seal to indicate that guest rooms haven’t been accessed since they were cleaned
-Extra disinfection of top 10 high touch areas in guest rooms including light switches and door handles
-Increased cleaning frequency of public areas and fitness centers
-Guest-accessible disinfecting wipes at entrances and high traffic areas
-Enhanced cleaning & other changes to buffets, in-room dining and meeting spaces
-Industry-leading contactless check-in and check-out with Digital Key at more than 4,700 properties globally

Our promise is to deliver the same level of reliable and friendly service you’d expect from Hilton, but with the added confidence of industry-leading hygiene practices created to keep you safe.

hotel_one_review: Pleasant mid-priced hotel offering grand rooms, board games and a bar.
description:
All our employees have their temperature taken before they start their shift. They wear gloves and masks and continually wash their hands. Employees do not work together, but in separated areas of the inn. Social distancing is monitored constantly. We have installed a glass type barrier at the front desk, all doors are kept locked and access is with intercom or guests key.
We have installed hand sanitizer at every exit door. Hand soap dispensers are also installed in all employee areas. Common area surfaces are wiped with sanitizer throughout the day.  All exterior seating is cleaned after each use. No housekeepers enter any guest’s room until after they have checked out. Daily service is by guest request only.
All rooms are sanitized by Ultra Violet lamps after check-out and whenever possible, we  isolate guest rooms for a 24 hour period (after departure). 
We have separated all outside seating by more than 6 feet. All inside dining has also been reconfigured to minimize guest con

hotel_one_review: Quaint mid-range hotel featuring a pool, beach access and bbq facilities.
description: Social distancing made easy. Commitment to Cleanliness ADDITIONAL OPTIONS WE'LL BE TEXTING YOU BEFORE YOUR STAY WITH ALL THE INFO YOU'LL NEED IN-ROOM CHECK-IN - We will leave the key and check-in package in the guest room for our arriving guests. You will drive straight to your room and bypass the Front Office. We will of course be available if you need anything. HOUSEKEEPING SERVICE - Housekeeping service during your stay will only be on request. We will of course be available to replenish towels and amenities. CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST - Prepare for picnic delights with our Graze & Go Continental! Customize your picnic basket each morning and enjoy your distance in style. We have Increased the frequency of cleaning and disinfecting, including disinfection of outdoor furniture. ﻿GUESTROOMS AND PUBLIC AREAS . We have thoughtfully enhanced protocols for cleaning and disinfecting, paying particular attention to high touch areas. for more info visit sesuitharborhouse.com/covid-19-update

hotel_one_review: Tranquil business-friendly hotel offering a restaurant, a pool and wifi.
description: At Courtyard by Marriott Boston Waltham in Waltham, Massachusetts, you’re located strategically along Route 95/128 (America’s Technology Highway), and only 20 minutes to downtown Boston. You’re merely 10 minutes away from historic Lexington and Concord. Comfortable, chic, and altogether welcoming. Whether you’re here on business, visiting nearby schools, or are a weekend traveler using our perfectly located Waltham hotel as the easiest and most comfortable base from which to explore Greater Boston, we welcome you! Whatever your purpose in visiting, we’re out to make the Courtyard by Marriott hotel in Waltham your favorite place to stay in the Boston area. Need Starbucks to start your day? Go no further than our lobby. Also find delicious breakfast and dinner selections at our Bistro. Did you know we have an open-air fire pit? Not to mention our courtyard outdoor oasis, where you can enjoy a breath of fresh air with your morning coffee, or catch the last rays of the day’s sun. In addition to a restaurant, Courtyard by Marriott Boston Waltham features an indoor pool and fitness center. Televisions come with cable/satellite channels. Guest rooms also feature complimentary wireless Internet access, complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, and air conditioning.

hotel_one_review: Sleek contemporary rooms in a pleasant mid-priced hotel with breakfast, a fitness center and free wifi.
description:
Choice Hotels takes pride in its hotels’ long-standing dedication to cleanliness, including our 150+ point cleanliness checklist already on every housekeeping cart as part of the Room Condition & Cleanliness program.  

As part of the Commitment to Clean initiative, Choice Hotels has provided our franchisees additional educational resources - enhanced best practices and extensive cleaning, disinfecting, hygiene, and social distancing best practices and protocols - leveraging partnerships with industry leaders and providing hotels with the latest resources and training. 

In addition, every Choice-branded hotel will designate a “Commitment to Clean Captain,” who will complete best-in-class cleanliness training and will be responsible for incorporating the new protocols into their hotel’s operations. 

Choice is a signatory to the U.S. Travel Association’s Industry Guidelines to Ensure the Health and Safety of Travelers.

hotel_one_review: Stylish upmarket hotel featuring warm contemporary rooms with a concierge, in-room air conditioning and free wifi.
description: Hotel Veritas is a 31-room independent upscale hotel located in Harvard Square offering intimate service in a hip Cantabrigian setting. The entire look and feel of the hotel is elegant and current, but with a respectful nod towards our traditional and historic neighborhood. The guest rooms are designed with the fine detailing of an old New England residence and furnishings that are interesting contemporary pieces with rich fabrics and textures.

hotel_one_review: Picturesque mid-range hotel featuring serene elegant rooms with a restaurant, bikes for guests and a pool.
description:
See why so many travelers make The Ponds at Foxhollow their hotel of choice when visiting Lenox. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.

Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Ventfort Hall Mansion and Gilded Age Museum (2.1 mi) and Concepts of Art Lenox Judaica (2.4 mi), guests of The Ponds At Foxhollow Hotel can easily experience some of Lenox's most well known attractions.

The Ponds At Foxhollow Hotel is a hotel offering a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.

The hotel features outdoor furniture and a picnic area. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool, which has made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Lenox. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.

Lenox has plenty of French restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like The Portico by Jeffrey Thompson, Blantyre, and Table Six Restaurant, which are serving up some great dishes.

If you are interested in exploring Lenox, check out a history museum, such as The Mount, Edith Wharton's Home.

At The Ponds at Foxhollow, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Lenox.

description:
A Cleaner Stay from Check-in to Check-Out
Hilton has partnered with RB, makers of Lysol® & Dettol®*, to help deliver an even cleaner stay for our guests with the Hilton CleanStay program. Building on our already rigorous cleaning standards, the program includes:

-Hilton CleanStay Room Seal to indicate that guest rooms haven’t been accessed since they were cleaned
-Extra disinfection of top 10 high touch areas in guest rooms including light switches and door handles
-Increased cleaning frequency of public areas and fitness centers
-Guest-accessible disinfecting wipes at entrances and high traffic areas
-Enhanced cleaning & other changes to buffets, in-room dining and meeting spaces
-Industry-leading contactless check-in and check-out with Digital Key at more than 4,700 properties globally

Our promise is to deliver the same level of reliable and friendly service you’d expect from Hilton, but with the added confidence of industry-leading hygiene practices created to keep you safe.

hotel_one_review: Lovely upscale hotel featuring restored rooms with a complimentary welcome drink, board games and a concierge.
description: Experience Revolutionary Hospitality at The Inn at Hastings Park, the only Relais & Chateaux hotel in Greater Boston. The Inn at Hastings Park is a boutique inn located in Lexington, Massachusetts, just 15 miles from Boston. Footsteps away from the Lexington Battle Green, a revered site where America's fight for liberty began, the Inn's two guest houses and barn are lovingly preserved historical buildings. Enjoy our elegantly appointed guest rooms and inspired New England cuisine in our restaurant, Town Meeting Bistro - with inside and outside dining. Coming soon: The Whispering Angel Culinary Garden. Social distancing and other safety protocols are in place.

hotel_one_review: Lovely eco-friendly hotel featuring casual rooms, a game room and in-room breakfast.
description: "Best Nantucket Boutique Hotel". Named #1 Small Hotel in the U.S.! A small boutique inn with designer interior. Ideally located in the heart of the historic village, this beautifully renovated Nantucket inn features twelve guest rooms with a crisp, tailored "New England-by-way-of-France" flair. Guests enjoy boutique hotel style and services mixed with a home-cooked country breakfast on the garden patio.

hotel_name: Courtyard by Marriott Boston Logan Airport
hotel_one_review: Located in Harbor View, this urban business-friendly hotel offers contemporary rooms, beach access and a restaurant.
description: We are committed to offering an environment that aligns with expert protocols for working to defeat COVID-19. Consisting of in-house and outside experts in food and water safety, hygiene and infection prevention, and hotel operations, our Marriott Cleanliness Council is redefining our cleaning and safety standards. Starting with our public spaces and high-traffic areas, Marriott is going above and beyond our normal protocols. We are cleaning surfaces with increased frequency, dedicated staff, and recommended cleaning agents. Marriott has elevated our rigorous protocols to thoroughly clean all surfaces with hospital-grade disinfectants. We will be placing disinfectant wipes in rooms. Hand sanitizing stations are being installed at hotel entrances, at our front desks, our elevator banks, and meeting spaces. Signage in public spaces will remind Marriott guests to maintain social distancing. Read more about Marriott’s Commitment to Clean by visiting https://clean.marriott.com/.

hotel_name: ShoreWay Acres Inn & Cape Cod Lodging
hotel_one_review: Stately contemporary rooms in a quaint mid-range hotel with a breakfast buffet, a heated pool and free internet.
description: Escape to Cape Cod's ShoreWay Acres Inn, and experience historic New England in a charming residential atmosphere. The Inn's ideal location in the heart of Falmouth's Historic District is within easy walking distance of the Village Green, Main Street shops, 20+ restaurants(ranging from sidewalk cafes and pubs to ethnic and fine dining)Surf Drive Beach, churches, Shining Sea Bikeway, Falmouth Museums on the Green, Carousel of Light and Cape Cod Trolley Stop. Martha's Vineyard ferries - one mile and three miles. Just a short drive to the fishing village of Woods Hole, Highfield Theater and Highfield Hall and Gardens.

description: A note from IHG® Hotels & Resorts: When you’re ready to travel again, we’ll be ready to welcome you. As the world adjusts to new travel norms and expectations, we’re enhancing the experience for you – our hotel guests – by redefining cleanliness and supporting wellbeing throughout your stay. We are expanding our commitment to cleanliness by: • Using new science-led protocols and service measures by enhancing the IHG Way of Clean • Partnering with industry leading experts Cleveland Clinic, Ecolab and Diversey • Launching a global IHG Clean Promise These strengthened procedures are designed to give you greater confidence and hotel teams the protection needed. hotel_one_review: Intimate family-friendly boutique hotel offering warm rooms, hiking and a breakfast buffet.
description:
The health and safety of our guests and staff are our top priority, and we have made some important changes to prepare for your future visit to the Berkshires. Through the end of the year we are offering an Airbnb Style Vacation and an additional 20% off our lowest available rates. Stay comfortable with contactless check-in direct to your room and self-service access to housekeeping amenities. You'll be greeted by a welcome basket and stocked Keurig coffeemaker. Masks are provided and required around the property. 

*Please note that with the discounted rates, breakfast is not included and main inn common areas are currently closed.

hotel_one_review: Charming mid-range hotel featuring ocean-view rooms, beach access and free internet.
description: Terrible tiny rooms, rude insensitive staff, absolutely NO security measures of any kind. I have never been in such an inhospitable atmosphere in the hospitality industry. It bills itself as a "boutique hotel" which is a laugh and a half--the common areas are shabby and there is nothing boutique about it except perhaps the tiny tiny rooms. If you want to be treated badly by staff and stay in a sub standard dwelling --this is your place.

hotel_one_review: Service-centric mid-priced hotel with a tennis court, free wifi and in-room dishwashers.
description: Enjoy the comfort of home while away from home. Each spacious, efficiency (condo-style) extended stay one bedroom apartment includes living room, kitchen, full bathroom, and deck. Each suite is air-conditioned and is equipped with a TV with cable, HBO and DVD player. Free T-1 enabled high-speed internet access. Kitchens have full, home-sized appliances. Choose from king, queen, or two double beds. Laundry facilities are on-site. Enjoy full privileges at the Yankee Inn's indoor & outdoor pools and exercise room (5 minutes south on Rte 7). Come stay for as little as a weekend (restricted dates-see RESERVATIONS page), by the week or month.

hotel_one_review: Quiet family-friendly hotel featuring contemporary rooms with a breakfast buffet, bbq facilities and a hot tub.
description: Hyatt House Boston/Burlington is a contemporary styled hotel with the comforts of home and office. With its residential feel and inviting social spaces, our hotel is a place to live, not just stay. Located 20 minutes from Boston, our hotel offers easy access to local businesses, shopping, dining and attractions, including Wayside Commons and historic Cambridge. Spread out and get comfortable in our spacious suites where you feel right at home. Go with a One-Bedroom or Two-Bedroom Suite, featuring a plush Hyatt Grand Bed(R), full kitchen with cabinets, dedicated work space and a living room with flat-panel TV and DVD for an evening of relaxation. Got extra guests? We've got a standard pull out sofa bed as well. Start your morning off with our complimentary Morning Spread with Omelet Bar. Grab freshly prepared sandwiches and salads from the 24-hour Guest Market or grab a few groceries for whipping up a meal in your room. Whether you are visiting for business or leisure, as our resident guest you will enjoy a 24-hour workout room, seasonal outdoor pool and a business center. Our friendly House Host is happy to help with anything else you need to feel connected and comfortable

description: As the newest of Cape Cod hotels, Hampton Inn Cape Cod welcomes you with a fabulous mix of amenities, including 'hot on the house' breakfast buffet, high-speed Internet access and state of the art 'jump start" fitness center, as well as an indoor and outdoor pool. Our combination of modern amenities and gracious guest rooms or suites make us the hotel of choice near Hyannis. In fact, we are the only Hampton Inn and Suites on the Cape, as well as the only hotel to be backed by Hampton Inn and Suites 100% satisfaction guarantee.

hotel_one_review: Modern business-friendly hotel offering contemporary rooms with a pool, beach access and a restaurant.
description: Received 2020 AAA Inspector's Best of Housekeeping Award for high cleanliness and condition scores.

hotel_one_review: Contemporary rooms in a quiet family-friendly hotel with an outdoor pool, free wifi and a breakfast buffet.
description: Experience it all - the excitement of Boston nearby, historic sites, national parks and generous amenities - at this newly renovated Concord, MA hotel.You'll feel right at home at the BEST WESTERN at Historic Concord. Delight in the many amenities provided in each of the spacious, clean rooms, including cable and HBO® on a flat screen television, a coffee maker and free wireless Internet. Wake up after a great night's sleep and dig into a complimentary full breakfast buffet. Just 25 miles from Boston and only 12 miles from Cambridge, guests can easily explore the big city without having to pay for a room that's too pricey. Explore the area with Walden Pond, Old North Bridge, Orchard House, the Concord Museum, Minuteman National Park and Lexington Green all nearby. Retail therapy at Burlington Mall is just minutes away.Those traveling on business are ensured a productive trip with Welches, Tom Tom, Polaroid, Phoenix Controls, Stratus and Monster all located within six miles or less of this Concord, MA hotel. Hanson Air Force Base, FEMA, Tufts University, Boston University and Harvard University are also nearby.The relaxation and excitement continues on the property with our outdoor seasonal pool and fitness center - we're the only hotel in Concord that offers both. Get even more value out of your stay with access to an on-site restaurant and lounge, free parking, guest laundry and fax and photocopying services. We also serve freshly baked cookies each day - a delicious treat to help you unwind after sightseeing or working in the area.Our kind, helpful staff is ready to make your stay this pet friendly Massachusetts hotel a wonderful experience.

hotel_one_review: Established family-friendly hotel featuring ocean-view rooms with a heated pool, boating and breakfast.
description: Our year-round hotel features on-the-water rooms with balconies overlooking beautiful salt water marshes. Walk from your room through our indoor skywalks to our lobby, restaurant, pool, jacuzzi, and function room. Spend time relaxing at our indoor, glass enclosed year-round chlorine-free pool and jacuzzi. Dine and unwind after a day of whale watching, fishing or shopping at our on-site restaurant, Mile Marker One, on the seasonal outdoor Bridge Deck, or indoor River View Dining Room and Bar. Enjoy your favorite drink, and watch the boats going by. All located on premise. A great place for couples, families, corporate business travel, reunions weddings, groups and tours, and get togethers.

hotel_one_review: Modern business-friendly hotel with free wifi, a restaurant and a fitness center.
description: Hyatt Place Marlborough / Apex Center is a 137-guestroom property. The hotel is located at a new development site called Apex Center, situated alongside route 20 just a half mile off Interstate 495 at exit 24B. Our hotel features a variety of room type configurations in a modern, upscale style, including six executive premiere suites. The hotel offers an oversized pool area, a workout center and 1,100 square feet of flexible meeting space. Guestrooms will offer the perfect blend of style and design so you can relax in comfort and stay productive.

hotel_one_review: Contemporary rooms in a tranquil mid-priced hotel with free internet, in-room fireplaces and a convenience store.
description:
We have elevated our standards for hygiene, cleaning, and safety.

Our enhanced measures include:
Partnering with industry expert Ecolab®, a global leader in hygiene and chemical products, to ensure training on hygiene and infection prevention expertise. 

Increasing the frequency of cleaning and special sanitizing using EPA-approved products throughout all public areas of the hotel, meeting spaces, guestrooms, and work areas with a focus on high-touch areas and hard surfaces.  

Physical distancing throughout all areas of the hotel including in public areas, fitness centers, meeting spaces, lobby, and work areas. 

Hotel associates use of PPE such as face coverings, temperature checks, and increased personal hygiene protocols including frequency of hand washing and wearing of gloves.

FREE PPE Kits at Check-In:  Every guest will receive a free personal protective equipment (PPE) kit upon check-in, including a mask and hand sanitizer.

description:
Days Inn by Wyndham Sturbridge is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Sturbridge, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.

Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.

Days Inn by Wyndham Sturbridge features a 24 hour front desk, newspaper, and a convenience store, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and breakfast. If you are driving to Quality Inn Sturbridge, free parking is available.

Should time allow, Wells State Park is a popular state park that is relatively easy to get to.

Enjoy your stay in Sturbridge!

hotel_one_review: Metropolitan business-friendly hotel with a breakfast buffet, free wifi and a fitness center.
description: The Inn at Brookline is located just minutes from downtown Boston amidst the charming brownstones and tree-lined streets of historic Brookline. Our hotel is near Boston University, Boston College, Hynes Convention Center, Fenway Park (home of the Boston Red Sox) and many Boston Hospitals, including Children's Hospital, Brigham and Women's Hospital and Dana Farber Cancer Institute. The hotel offers free shuttle service to the Longwood Medical Area. The Inn at Brookline has a beautiful hotel lounge and restaurant with room service located on our first floor serving you in our 6-story atrium under umbrellas and arches central to our indoor heated pool. This 226 room, pet-friendly Boston hotel also offers free Wi-Fi, fitness room, guest laundry and dry-cleaning services, bell service, and an on-site parking garage.

description: We are committed to offering an environment that aligns with expert protocols for working to defeat COVID-19. Consisting of in-house and outside experts in food and water safety, hygiene and infection prevention, and hotel operations, our Marriott Cleanliness Council is redefining our cleaning and safety standards. Starting with our public spaces and high-traffic areas, Marriott is going above and beyond our normal protocols. We are cleaning surfaces with increased frequency, dedicated staff, and recommended cleaning agents. Marriott has elevated our rigorous protocols to thoroughly clean all surfaces with hospital-grade disinfectants. We will be placing disinfectant wipes in rooms. Hand sanitizing stations are being installed at hotel entrances, at our front desks, our elevator banks, and meeting spaces. Signage in public spaces will remind Marriott guests to maintain social distancing. Read more about Marriott’s Commitment to Clean by visiting https://clean.marriott.com/.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express Fall River North
hotel_one_review: Business-friendly hotel with breakfast, a pool and a tennis court.
description: The Comfort Inn & Suites® hotel is less than six miles from Battleship Cove, the world's largest historic naval ship exhibit. This maritime museum has displays and attractions like the USS Joseph P. Kennedy, Jr., the USS Massachusetts, the USS Lionfish, PT boats, helicopters, museums, eateries, gift shops and more. Additional points of interest close to this Fall River, MA hotel include the Lizzie Borden Museum, Lizzie Borden Gravesite and the Fall River Historical Society. We are also a short distance away from Historical Newport, RI and Cape Cod, MA.

hotel_one_review: We compared the lowest prices from 6 websites
Value hotel featuring breakfast, a golf course and a pool.
description:
Choice Hotels takes pride in its hotels’ long-standing dedication to cleanliness, including our 150+ point cleanliness checklist already on every housekeeping cart as part of the Room Condition & Cleanliness program.  

As part of the Commitment to Clean initiative, Choice Hotels has provided our franchisees additional educational resources - enhanced best practices and extensive cleaning, disinfecting, hygiene, and social distancing best practices and protocols - leveraging partnerships with industry leaders and providing hotels with the latest resources and training. 

In addition, every Choice-branded hotel will designate a “Commitment to Clean Captain,” who will complete best-in-class cleanliness training and will be responsible for incorporating the new protocols into their hotel’s operations. 

Choice is a signatory to the U.S. Travel Association’s Industry Guidelines to Ensure the Health and Safety of Travelers.

hotel_one_review: Welcoming business-friendly hotel with a heated pool, a game room and a restaurant.
description:
If you’re looking for a hotel in Marlborough, look no further than Best Western Royal Plaza Hotel & Trade Center.

The rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.

Best Western Royal Plaza Hotel & Trade features a 24 hour front desk, room service, and express check-in and check-out. In addition, as a valued Best Western Marlborough guest, you can enjoy a pool and free breakfast that are available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.

While in Marlborough be sure to experience local filet mignon favorites at The Fish Restaurant & Wine Bar.

The staff at Best Western Royal Plaza Hotel & Trade Center looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

description: We are Springfield's only B&B/Boutique Hotel, we have all en-suite baths and accommodations on the first floor. Paired with affordability, exceptional service, and convenient highway access, we offer the Inn experience five minutes from the Basketball Hall of Fame, and Dr. Suess Memorial. We are ten minutes from the Big E and Six Flags, and twenty minutes from Bradley International Airport.

Enjoy our on-site restaurant and lounge featuring contemporary New England fare and many gluten free and heart healthy options. Relax and unwind in our over-sized, indoor saltwater swimming pool or work out in our state of the art fitness center. Our complimentary local shuttle is available to take you to many local attractions as well as upscale shopping and dining.

hotel_one_review: Service-centric business-friendly hotel featuring free wifi, a bar and a pool.
description:
See why so many travelers make Westford Regency Inn their hotel of choice when visiting Westford. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.

Westford Regency Inn offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.

The hotel offers room service, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool and a lounge. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.

Bobby's Ranch (2.4 mi), located nearby, makes Westford Regency Inn a great place to stay for those interested in visiting this popular Westford landmark.

While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Mexican restaurants, including Chipotle Mexican Grill and Chili's Grill & Bar, all of which are a short distance from Westford Regency Hotel.

If you are interested in exploring Westford, check out an art gallery, such as Parish Center for the Arts.

We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Westford Regency Inn as you experience all of the things Westford has to offer.

hotel_one_review: Contemporary rooms in a tranquil mid-priced hotel with a heated pool, a convenience store and a restaurant.
description: As we remain open to provide accommodations for those traveling, the Hilton Garden Inn Boston/Waltham, continues to monitor developments and follow guidance provided by local and federal health and government agencies. This may result in modifications to our amenities or services. In addition, we’ve applied advanced measures to already rigorous housekeeping routines in both the public areas and guestrooms.

hotel_one_review: Quiet mid-range hotel featuring contemporary rooms, free breakfast and a fitness center.
description: The Homewood Suites, Boston-Billerica is a 147 all-suite hotel located approximately 20 miles north of Boston within a quiet suburban area. We are only 5 minutes away from shopping malls, movie theaters, many options for casual and fine dining as well as historical Lexington, and Concord. We offer a complimentary shuttle service within a 5 mile radius of the hotel, 7AM-7PM during the weekdays and weekend hours may be limited. Our suites offer fully equipped kitchens with service for four, the option of one king bed or two double beds in a separate bedroom area, a separate livingroom area with a pull-out couch and a flat screen television within each room. We offer a complimentary "suite start" breakfast buffet each morning (6AM-9AM on the weekdays, 7AM-10AM on the weekends)and a complimentary dinner Monday through Thursday 5-7PM, serving a main entree' sides, salad bar and soft drinks. Take advantage of a great workout in our onsite fitness center featuring personal Precor equipment, take a dip in our indoor heated pool and whirlpool or pass some time by surfing the internet in our executive business center. Wireless internet is always complimentary throughout the hotel for your convenience. We also offer complimentary grocery shopping services, an on-site laundry facility, same-day dry cleaning, and not to mention a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee! Welcome Home!

We are Open! 

Our property follows all CDC guidelines and focuses on appropriate cleaning and disinfecting protocols. As it always has been, the safety of our guests and associates is and always will be of paramount importance to us. We are prepared to navigate through these challenging circumstances with your safety and confidence at the forefront of everything we do.  If you have any additional questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

As the world adjusts to new travel norms and expectations, we’re enhancing the experience for you – our hotel guests – by redefining cleanliness and supporting wellbeing throughout your stay. We are expanding our commitment to cleanliness by: • Using new science-led protocols and service measures by enhancing the IHG Way of Clean • Partnering with industry leading experts Cleveland Clinic, Ecolab and Diversey • Launching a global IHG Clean Promise These strengthened procedures are designed to give you greater confidence and hotel teams the protection needed. For more information, please visit https://www.ihg.com/content/us/en/customer-care/clean-promise.

hotel_one_review: Contemporary rooms in a quiet family-friendly hotel with a bar, bike rentals and a fitness center.
description: We are committed to offering an environment that aligns with expert protocols for working to defeat COVID-19. Consisting of in-house and outside experts in food and water safety, hygiene and infection prevention, and hotel operations, our Marriott Cleanliness Council is redefining our cleaning and safety standards. Starting with our public spaces and high-traffic areas, Marriott is going above and beyond our normal protocols. We are cleaning surfaces with increased frequency, dedicated staff, and recommended cleaning agents. Marriott has elevated our rigorous protocols to thoroughly clean all surfaces with hospital-grade disinfectants. We will be placing disinfectant wipes in rooms. Hand sanitizing stations are being installed at hotel entrances, at our front desks, our elevator banks, and meeting spaces. Signage in public spaces will remind Marriott guests to maintain social distancing. Read more about Marriott’s Commitment to Clean by visiting https://clean.marriott.com/.

hotel_name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston Marlborough
hotel_one_review: Mid-priced hotel offering a pool, free breakfast and free internet.
description: Our hotel is conveniently located off I-495, minutes from major offices such as GE, IBM and Raytheon. Whether you're visiting for three nights or three weeks, our modern suites have everything you need to feel at home away from home. Kick back on the sofa watching the HDTV and cook your favorite meals in the full kitchen. Join us for a free hot full breakfast each day.

hotel_one_review: Tranquil mid-priced hotel offering marina-view rooms, an outdoor dining area and a heated pool.
description: Seaport Inn and Marina is located on the beautiful New Bedford-Fairhaven waterfront centrally located to beaches, parks, shopping centers, restaurants, as well as the historic and business districts of Fairhaven, New Bedford, and Dartmouth. This full service hotel offers easy access to the most popular destinations just minutes from the high-speed Martha's Vineyard ferry. Only 40 miles from the lowest fare ferry to Martha's Vineyard or Nantucket, 40 miles South of Boston, and 20 miles from Cape Cod and Newport. Seaport Inn and Marina has 84 guest rooms including deluxe suites and a bridal preparation suite. We also offer to the visitors of New Bedford conference center and event space, hospitality suite, indoor swimming pool and an onsite bar & grill.

hotel_one_review: Magnificent contemporary rooms in a welcoming business-friendly hotel with darts, a heated pool and an outdoor dining area.
description:
A Cleaner Stay from Check-in to Check-Out
Hilton has partnered with RB, makers of Lysol® & Dettol®*, to help deliver an even cleaner stay for our guests with the Hilton CleanStay program. Building on our already rigorous cleaning standards, the program includes:

-Hilton CleanStay Room Seal to indicate that guest rooms haven’t been accessed since they were cleaned
-Extra disinfection of top 10 high touch areas in guest rooms including light switches and door handles
-Increased cleaning frequency of public areas and fitness centers
-Guest-accessible disinfecting wipes at entrances and high traffic areas
-Enhanced cleaning & other changes to buffets, in-room dining and meeting spaces
-Industry-leading contactless check-in and check-out with Digital Key at more than 4,700 properties globally

Our promise is to deliver the same level of reliable and friendly service you’d expect from Hilton, but with the added confidence of industry-leading hygiene practices created to keep you safe.

hotel_one_review: Stylish mid-range hotel featuring contemporary rooms with a concierge, free wifi and kids activities.
description:
Hotel 1868 will continue to provide you with a safe and enjoyable experience.  We share your concerns about the cleanliness and security of your stay as the COVID-19 situation continues to evolve.  We have implemented several new policies and cleaning procedures to ensure the safety and comfort of you and our employees. Please visit our website for more details.

Our evolving polices are guided by information obtained by the CDC, local authorities, and industry leading experts.  Your safety will always remain our top priority while we navigate our “new normal.”   Our staff is eager to assist you 24/7 with any questions or concerns that may arise during this time. 

We look forward to welcoming you back and providing the same great service you've come to love.

Be well and stay safe.

Sincerely,
Curtis Butcher

hotel_one_review: Metropolitan mid-priced hotel in South Boston with city-view rooms, breakfast and a fitness center.
description: Experience Southie at the new Cambria® Hotel Boston Downtown. This upscale hotel is casually curated for the modern traveler and influenced by its neighborhood, the local art scene, and the natural scenery of New England. Sip expertly signature cocktails while taking in stunning views from our rooftop bar which will inspire you to Explore Everywhere by walking through the epicenter of Boston’s tech hub and to the Seaport District. The famous Boston "T" at the Broadway MBTA Station, right outside of the hotel entrance, connecting you to all of parts of Boston & Cambridge. Locally sourced and in season fare is available in the lobby restaurant, a state-of-the-art fitness center, contemporary guest rooms and 4000 sq ft of naturally-lit event space will provide guests with an experience unlike any other hotel in the Boston area. Experience Southie. Explore Everywhere.

hotel_one_review: Mid-range hotel featuring contemporary rooms, a bar and a hot tub.
description: The Best Western Plus Waltham Boston is now completely renovated both on the interior and on the exterior. Our goal is to provide you with a superior guest experience through the aesthetic beauty of our upgraded hotel and by providing you with a great deal of personal comfort. Our well-appointed guest rooms feature new furniture, bedding, wallpaper, paint, carpets, lighting, 37-inch LCD flat screen TVs, high-speed internet access, complimentary full breakfast, artwork, mirrors, granite vanities, faucets and bathtubs. We also feature an indoor pool and fitness center. We are also a green hotel and we are 100% smoke free.

hotel_one_review: Charming mid-priced hotel featuring in-room flat-screen televisions, free internet and free parking.
description: Eleven room motel with great views of marsh and Scorton river. Located five miles from the center of Sandwich. Near great restaurants and beaches. Sorry pets are not allowed.

hotel_one_review: Quiet family-friendly hotel with a hot tub, free wifi and free breakfast.
description:
See why so many travelers make Hampton Inn Sturbridge their hotel of choice when visiting Sturbridge. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.

Close to Hyland Orchard & Brewery (2.0 mi), a popular Sturbridge landmark, Hampton Inn Sturbridge Hotel is a great destination for tourists.

Rooms at Hampton Inn Sturbridge Hotel offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.

A 24 hour front desk, baggage storage, and newspaper are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A pool and free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Sturbridge Hampton Inn, free parking is available.

If you like seafood restaurants, Hampton Inn Sturbridge is conveniently located near Sturbridge Seafood.

If you are interested in exploring Sturbridge, check out a history museum, such as Old Sturbridge Village.

At Hampton Inn Sturbridge, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Sturbridge.

hotel_one_review: Popular family-friendly hotel with a bar, free internet and an outdoor pool.
description: Located just seconds off of Interstate-95/Route128. The Hyatt House – Boston/Waltham is conveniently located near many attractions, companies, and educational institutes. Located just 2.5 miles away from Bentley University and 3.6 miles away from Brandeis University, the property is very conducive for those students/families visiting and attending these major colleges. Our property is also convenient for those traveling to/attending Lasell College, Regis College, Boston College, Boston University, Wellesley College, MIT, Tufts University, Babson College and Harvard University. In addition, the Hyatt House – Boston/Waltham is located only 2.5 miles away from Moody Street in Waltham, MA; a tourist/local favorite. Moody Street (“Restaurant City”) is Waltham's historically well-known town center and is lined with a variety of restaurants, bars/pubs and local attractions. Situated in the heart of the Massachusetts Route 128 technology belt, only 15 minutes from downtown Boston the Hyatt House is an excellent option for business travelers. It is centrally located to the corporate offices of Dassault Systemes, Deloitte & Touche, IBM, Microsoft, Raytheon, Shire Pharmaceuticals, Siemens, Thermo Fisher Scientific and Verizon. All Hyatt House hotels are smoke-free.

hotel_one_review: Quiet family-friendly hotel featuring free wifi, a fitness center and a breakfast buffet.
description:
Choice Hotels takes pride in its hotels’ long-standing dedication to cleanliness, including our 150+ point cleanliness checklist already on every housekeeping cart as part of the Room Condition & Cleanliness program.  

As part of the Commitment to Clean initiative, Choice Hotels has provided our franchisees additional educational resources - enhanced best practices and extensive cleaning, disinfecting, hygiene, and social distancing best practices and protocols - leveraging partnerships with industry leaders and providing hotels with the latest resources and training. 

In addition, every Choice-branded hotel will designate a “Commitment to Clean Captain,” who will complete best-in-class cleanliness training and will be responsible for incorporating the new protocols into their hotel’s operations. 

Choice is a signatory to the U.S. Travel Association’s Industry Guidelines to Ensure the Health and Safety of Travelers.

hotel_one_review: Family-friendly hotel with a breakfast buffet, a sun terrace and a pool.
description: This recently renovated, Three Diamond Massachusetts hotel in Chelmsford is a great choice for a stay in the New England area. The BEST WESTERN PLUS Chelmsford Inn offers guests comfortable accommodations with complimentary HOT breakfast buffet,free high-speed wireless Internet access,Keurig coffee makers and refrigerators in every room. Hotel amenities include an outdoor pool, fitness center, satellite television, free parking and a new restaurant/lounge - Moonstones for all to enjoy. Hotel banquet facilities are also available and are ideal for a special event or business meeting. With easy access to the highway, guests can easily head to Boston for an exciting day in the city or make the quick 27-mile drive to the Boston Logan International Airport. Visitors shouldn't miss America's Industrial Revolution commemorated at the Lowell National Historic Park in neighboring Lowell, Massachusetts. Experience all the rich historical attractions that abound in the Boston and New England region while staying at the BEST WESTERN PLUS Chelmsford Inn- great accommodations and service at a great value.

hotel_name: Red Roof Inn Boston - Southborough/ Worcester
hotel_one_review: Family-friendly hotel offering in-room flat-screen televisions, free parking and free wifi.
description: Red Roof Inn Boston – Southborough/Worcester is one of the best 100% smoke-free budget hotels in Southborough near both I-495 and I-90 expressways. We are not far from Framingham State College, the University of Massachusetts – Worcester, Solomon Pond Mall, Natick Mall, Gillette Stadium, Fenway Park, Hopkinton State Park, Callahan State Park, Minute Man National Historical Park, Danforth Art Museum, the New England Sports Complex (NESC), the New England Center for Children, Worcester Regional Airport (ORH) and Logan International Airport. We offer our guests free Verified Wi-Fi and an expanded cable package. Red Roof Inn Boston – Southborough/Worcester is a pet-friendly hotel.
