hotel_one_review: Family-friendly hotel with free breakfast, bike rentals and a heated pool.
description: The brand new Best Western Providence-Seekonk Inn features 50 rooms, three stories, and one elevator with indoor pool and fitness room. We offer complimentary local calls, free continental breakfast and free high-speed Internet access and an on-site business center. All rooms have mini refrigerator, microwave, coffee/tea maker, iron/ironing board, and hairdryers.

hotel_name: Regency Inn and Suites, West Springfield
hotel_one_review: Welcoming mid-range hotel offering a concierge, a fitness center and free breakfast.
description: Welcome Home - to Regency Inn & Suites! ​ Across the Bridge from the New MGM Casino, Downtown Springfield entertainment area and business center. ​ Closest Hotel to the Six-flags of new England. Across the Eastern States Exposition, the ”Big E” Fair Grounds, off Route 147. ​ The Regency Inn & Suites is very peaceful and private, located in a residential area. Its close to major highways and states routes. It is within walking distances from some of the best fine dining and fast-food restaurants. ​ Enjoy continental breakfast, from 7.30 am to 9.30 am. ​ Welcome to sample our hospitality the next time you are in the Greater Springfield area in the Pioneer Valley. Warm and friendly welcome awaits you. ​ When you are here, you are family !!!

hotel_one_review: Charming mid-priced hotel offering billiards, free breakfast and a fitness center.
description: The Westborough Inn is a family owned, colonial style Inn within walking distance of historic Westborough, MA. Enjoy your visit in one of our 25 elegant guest rooms and join us in the breakfast room each morning for a complimentary continental breakfast. Our beautifully appointed Inn is a welcome home to guests who visit for a day or extended stays. The Inn is a modern facility designed to blend in with surrounding 19th century Greek Revival architecture. Guests can walk to fifteen restaurants, shops, schools, and the library. Complementary continental breakfast, wi-fi, parking, and HD TV with HBO.

We are expanding our commitment to cleanliness by: • Using new science-led protocols and service measures by enhancing the IHG Way of Clean • Partnering with industry leading experts Cleveland Clinic, Ecolab and Diversey • Launching a global IHG Clean Promise These strengthened procedures are designed to give you greater confidence and hotel teams the protection needed. For more information, please visit https://www.ihg.com/content/us/en/customer-care/clean-promise.

hotel_one_review: Family-friendly hotel featuring contemporary rooms with a fitness center, a breakfast buffet and free wifi.
description: The newly renovated Best Western Braintree Inn located in Braintree, MA is conveniently located 11 miles south of historic Boston. If shopping is on your agenda, you will find most retail and department stores just minutes away at the South Shore Plaza. The Best Western Braintree Inn is also just a short distance from recognized restaurants such as The Cheesecake Factory®, Legal Sea Foods, Davio’s® Northern Italian Steakhouse, 99® Restaurant & Pub, TGI Fridays®, 110 Grill as well as delicious local favorites. Want to spend an afternoon at the ballpark or are you looking to visit presidential sites? We are conveniently located 12 miles from Fenway Park, home of the Boston Red Sox, and only 20 miles from Gillette Stadium, host to the New England Patriots and we are only 3 miles from the Quincy Adams T Station and 7 miles from the John F. Kennedy Presidential Library and Museum.

hotel_one_review: Business-friendly hotel featuring bike rentals, an outdoor pool and free breakfast.
description: We are committed to offering an environment that aligns with expert protocols for working to defeat COVID-19. Consisting of in-house and outside experts in food and water safety, hygiene and infection prevention, and hotel operations, our Marriott Cleanliness Council is redefining our cleaning and safety standards. Starting with our public spaces and high-traffic areas, Marriott is going above and beyond our normal protocols. We are cleaning surfaces with increased frequency, dedicated staff, and recommended cleaning agents. Marriott has elevated our rigorous protocols to thoroughly clean all surfaces with hospital-grade disinfectants. We will be placing disinfectant wipes in rooms. Hand sanitizing stations are being installed at hotel entrances, at our front desks, our elevator banks, and meeting spaces. Signage in public spaces will remind Marriott guests to maintain social distancing. Read more about Marriott’s Commitment to Clean by visiting https://clean.marriott.com/.

hotel_name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Brockton (Boston), MA
hotel_one_review: Family-friendly hotel with a hot tub, a breakfast buffet and free wifi.
description:
One of our highest priorities is the health, safety, and security of our guests and team members. COVID-19 has fundamentally changed the way we live, and we are adjusting our daily operations to fit within the new normal. In response to this, we and a team of experts have reviewed our existing health and safety processes and developed a new safety protocol. This in-depth cleanliness and disinfection protocol was created in partnership with SGS and is designed to ensure your safety and peace of mind from check-in to check-out.

A new 20-step protocol for hotels and 10-step protocol for event spaces is being introduced to our hotels. New cleaning and disinfection procedures, increased attention to safety in communal spaces, protective equipment and updated training for team members are included in the new protocols. All our worldwide hotels are briefed on these protocols and strongly encouraged to implement them.

hotel_one_review: Value hotel featuring free parking, breakfast and free internet.
description:
Choice Hotels takes pride in its hotels’ long-standing dedication to cleanliness, including our 150+ point cleanliness checklist already on every housekeeping cart as part of the Room Condition & Cleanliness program.  

As part of the Commitment to Clean initiative, Choice Hotels has provided our franchisees additional educational resources - enhanced best practices and extensive cleaning, disinfecting, hygiene, and social distancing best practices and protocols - leveraging partnerships with industry leaders and providing hotels with the latest resources and training. 

In addition, every Choice-branded hotel will designate a “Commitment to Clean Captain,” who will complete best-in-class cleanliness training and will be responsible for incorporating the new protocols into their hotel’s operations. 

Choice is a signatory to the U.S. Travel Association’s Industry Guidelines to Ensure the Health and Safety of Travelers.

hotel_name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Boston South Bay
hotel_one_review: Hotel featuring a business center, free wifi and free breakfast.
description:
A Cleaner Stay from Check-in to Check-Out
Hilton has partnered with RB, makers of Lysol® & Dettol®*, to help deliver an even cleaner stay for our guests with the Hilton CleanStay program. Building on our already rigorous cleaning standards, the program includes:

-Hilton CleanStay Room Seal to indicate that guest rooms haven’t been accessed since they were cleaned
-Extra disinfection of top 10 high touch areas in guest rooms including light switches and door handles
-Increased cleaning frequency of public areas and fitness centers
-Guest-accessible disinfecting wipes at entrances and high traffic areas
-Enhanced cleaning & other changes to buffets, in-room dining and meeting spaces
-Industry-leading contactless check-in and check-out with Digital Key at more than 4,700 properties globally

Our promise is to deliver the same level of reliable and friendly service you’d expect from Hilton, but with the added confidence of industry-leading hygiene practices created to keep you safe.

hotel_one_review: Tranquil business-friendly hotel featuring a restaurant, a heated pool and beach access.
description:
As we navigate these unprecedented times, our number one focus continues to be on providing our guests and associates with a safe, healthy and enjoyable environment now and in the future. We are regularly monitoring updates surrounding COVID-19 through the Center for Disease Control (CDC), and state and local health agencies. We have developed stringent guidelines to follow including:

1. Cleaning/Disinfecting Public Areas at least once per hour
2. Checking Associate Temperatures three times per shift
3. Installing Plexiglass Shields at every front desk station
4. Placing hand sanitizer stations in public areas
5. Washing hands multiple times per shift following CDC procedures
6. Wearing and changing gloves multiple times per shift
7. Offering prepackaged items in our Corner Pantry

hotel_one_review: Business-friendly hotel featuring a breakfast buffet, free internet and a fitness center.
description: This smoke-free Best Western Milford Inn hotel in Milford, MA is conveniently located right off of exit 20 on Interstate 495, a short drive from Boston and Providence. Milford borders Hopkinton, Holliston, Mendon, and Hopedale. We are located just 20 minutes from Gillette Stadium, 30 minutes from the Xfinity Center, and 40 minutes from Fenway Park. The area has plenty of choices for dining and shopping and a cinema 10 minutes down the road in Bellingham. All rooms have coffee makers, lamps with USB charging, hair dryers, irons with boards, and luggage benches as well as 43" flat screen TVs. Some rooms come equipped with microwaves and and all have refrigerators. Enjoy a free hot breakfast featuring plenty of options hot or cold. You are invited to enjoy our our fitness center, free high-speed wireless internet, guest laundry facilities, and free coffee and tea is available 24/7 in the breakfast room. All upper floor rooms are accessible by elevator.

description: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston Woburn is located just off I-95, 11 miles to BOS Airport and near attractions like New England Aquarium, Freedom Trail, Fenway Park, Stone Zoo, Tufts University and Faneuil Hall Marketplace. Our spacious suites include complimentary WiFi, a Smart HDTV, sofa bed, and full kitchen. Enjoy amenities like free hot full breakfast, our Heated Indoor Pool, and more. Our extensive Fitness Center features free weights, machines including a Peloton bicycle. Our meeting room is ideal for small meetings.

hotel_name: The Boxboro Regency Hotel and Conference Center
hotel_one_review: Tranquil business-friendly hotel offering a pool, a gift shop and a restaurant.
description:
If you’re looking for a family-friendly hotel in Boxborough, look no further than The Boxboro Regency.

Rooms at The Boxboro Regency provide a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.

In addition, while staying at Holiday Inn Boxborough guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and express check-in and check-out. You can also enjoy a pool and breakfast. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Holiday Inn Boxborough (i-495 Exit 28) Hotel.

If you like Mexican restaurants, The Boxboro Regency is conveniently located near Oscar's Burritos Mexican Grill.

The staff at The Boxboro Regency looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

hotel_one_review: Mid-range hotel with a game room, bbq facilities and a hot tub.
description:
Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in West Yarmouth does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Holly Tree Resort, a nice option for travelers like you.

Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and Holly Tree Resort makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.

You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and barbeque facilities during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.

While in West Yarmouth, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Holly Tree Hotel, including Yarmouth House (0.3 mi), Keltic Kitchen (0.1 mi), and Ann & Fran's Kitchen (0.3 mi).

Holly Tree Resort looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to West Yarmouth.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express Boston Logan Airport - Revere
hotel_one_review: “Other hotels we stayed at on our New England trip offered ho...”
description: This place is poorly run in my opinion....Young kids that don’t get it at all. After you drive all day and want to retire to your room, they require you to take a parking pass out to your car and display it in the windshield. Ask for anything and they won’t provide it. Ask for a later check out....... NOPE! Too many other options to deal with this crap. They offer nothing. Hampton Inn is sooooo much better and right down the street. They get the idea of service over there. This must be an absentee owner because they clearly don’t care about service or upkeep. Try to find the entrance! This place is AWFUL! PASS!

hotel_one_review: “Hotel overlooks the river. Two story walk up. New carpet....”
description: Though this was our second time here,the bedroom itself was ok, the issues husband and I had were mostly in the bathroom. When stepping into the tub, the bottom was soft and moving!! like there was nothing underneath, and the white baseboards hadn't been cleaned in a long time. The cheap shower curtain had hair on it before we even stepped in. One final thing was the chair beside bed was full of dust also, along with a dirty spot on the blanket, which grossed us out. I did call management after checking out by phone of the dissatifaction, not of asking for a refund but only to let them be aware that their cleaning staff are not doing a good job at all. She told me they will soon be updating their bathrooms. For their sake I hope so and start having their staff do what luxury hotels do...clean clean clean! No one wants a dirty room to sleep or bathe in. I trust that all will improve soon, and maybe if we feel lucky that we'll be back.…

hotel_one_review: Mid-range hotel featuring contemporary rooms, a game room and free breakfast.
description: We welcome you to the Ambassador Inn & Suites. We strive to make your stay as relaxing and enjoyable as possible. With our newly renovated hotel, we guarantee comfort, quality, and satisfaction. The hotel has a wide array of services such as a complimentary continental breakfast, indoor and outdoor pools, sauna, game room, business center, wireless Internet access and abundant parking. We offer affordable rates and hope you come and spend your vacation with us. Many others have done so already and statistics show approximately 89% of our guests are returning. The Ambassador Inn & Suites looks forward to connecting you with the heart of Cape Cod. The Ambassador Inn and Suites is perfectly located with easy access to some of the best Eastern Atlantic vacation experiences such as the Hyannis Whale Watcher Cruises and historic points of interests like the John F. Kennedy Museum and Cape Cod museums including the Cape Cop Maritime Museum. This hotel is also close to the ZooQuarium, Heritage Museums and Gardens and Cape Cod Community College. The Barnstable Municipal Airport is five miles away. Enjoy shopping at the nearby Cape Cod Mall. The Thornton Burgess Museum is also close by. A variety of fine golf courses and off-shore salt water fishing opportunities are in the surrounding area of The Ambassador Inn & Suites.

hotel_one_review: Tranquil eco-friendly hotel in Dorchester featuring a breakfast buffet, free wifi and a pool.
description:
If you’re looking for a quiet hotel in Boston, look no further than Comfort Inn - Boston.

Close to some of Boston's most popular landmarks, such as Dorchester North Burying Grounds (1.9 mi) and James Blake House (2.0 mi), Comfort Inn - Boston Hotel is a great destination for tourists.

Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.

The property also features a pool and breakfast to make your visit even more pleasant. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.

If you are looking for some good spots to eat nearby, you may want to check out Eire Pub (0.8 mi), El Oriental de Cuba (0.5 mi), or Venezia (0.4 mi), all of which are within walking distance of Boston Comfort Inn.

If you are interested in exploring Boston, check out one of the architectural buildings, such as Prudential Center, Marriott's Custom House, and John Hancock Tower.

The staff at Comfort Inn - Boston looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

hotel_one_review: Contemporary rooms in a quiet business-friendly hotel with a bar, a fitness center and a picnic area.
description: You can check in using you Marriott Bonvoy mobile check-in and to check out just leave the keys in the room . Your safety is a priority to us and all the before mentioned steps are being taken for your safety.

hotel_one_review: Business-friendly hotel featuring free wifi, free breakfast and a pool.
description: Welcome to the Best Western Merrimack Valley, located off Interstate 495 in Haverhill, Massachusetts. This Merrimack Valley area hotel is conveniently close to Canobie Lake Park, the Salisbury State Reservation, Hampton Beach and the Salem Witch Museums. The Best Western Merrimack Valley offers spaciously appointed guest rooms, each featuring a microwave, refrigerator, cable satellite television and free high-speed Internet access. This New England hotel serves a complimentary breakfast each morning. Additional amenities include a fitness center, an indoor heated swimming pool, hot tub, guest laundry and full business services. Pets are welcome. This Haverhill hotel is close to many area attractions including the Budweiser(R) Brewery, New Hampshire and Northern Massachusetts ski areas, the Strawbery Banke Museum in Portsmouth, and the USS Constitution in Charlestown. Guests will also be close to attractions such as Merrimack College, the University of Massachusetts Lowell Campus, the Freedom Trail and the Boston Science Museum. Corporate travelers will appreciate convenient access to the Ward Hill Business Park, Osgood Landing, Raytheon and Cisco Systems.

hotel_one_review: Colonial style value hotel with free breakfast, free wifi and an outdoor pool.

Hotel Amenities are Outdoor Pool, Free Breakfast, Free High Speed wireless internet, Free Parking, Truck/Bus Parking, Cable with HBO. Every room has air condition, High Speed wireless Internet, Microwave, Fridge, Coffee Maker, Hairdryer, Iron and Ironing Board. Extra amenities includes ice machines, Extra bed ($10.00), Crib ( $ 10.00), safe deposit box ($ 1.50), local phone, AM/FM radios/ Alarm Clocks. Hotel is minutes away from Mass Pike (Exit-2) and conveniently located on Routes 20 & 7 in Lenox, Massachusetts. Visit nearby museums, theaters, ski areas (Jiminy Peak & Brodie Mountain), cross-country skiing, shopping stores, scenic bike routes, mountain biking trails and hiking trails (including Appalachian Trail & Taconic ) while staying at Howard Johnson Express Inn Hotels in Lenox MA. Tanglewood is only 5.6 miles from this Howard Johnson.

hotel_one_review: Tranquil mid-priced hotel with free wifi, a heated pool and a restaurant.
description: The Heritage House Hotel is Cape Cod's first Solar Powered Hotel, we are making a constant effort toward greener business practices. We are conveniently located one block from Hyannis Harbor, which is the departure point for the Martha's Vineyard, Nantucket, and Whale Watch Ferries. While at the property explore Main Street Waterfront District, offering antique shops, galleries, kayak and bike rentals, dancing, dinning, and live entertainment. We are located directly across from the Regional Transportation Center and Train- Home of Boston's Cape Cod Flyer.

hotel_one_review: Quiet business-friendly hotel featuring contemporary rooms, a breakfast buffet and a heated pool.
description:
A Cleaner Stay from Check-in to Check-Out
Hilton has partnered with RB, makers of Lysol® & Dettol®*, to help deliver an even cleaner stay for our guests with the Hilton CleanStay program. Building on our already rigorous cleaning standards, the program includes:

-Hilton CleanStay Room Seal to indicate that guest rooms haven’t been accessed since they were cleaned
-Extra disinfection of top 10 high touch areas in guest rooms including light switches and door handles
-Increased cleaning frequency of public areas and fitness centers
-Guest-accessible disinfecting wipes at entrances and high traffic areas
-Enhanced cleaning & other changes to buffets, in-room dining and meeting spaces
-Industry-leading contactless check-in and check-out with Digital Key at more than 4,700 properties globally

Our promise is to deliver the same level of reliable and friendly service you’d expect from Hilton, but with the added confidence of industry-leading hygiene practices created to keep you safe.

hotel_one_review: Colonial style mid-priced hotel offering contemporary rooms with free internet, an outdoor pool and a restaurant.
description: We are committed to offering an environment that aligns with expert protocols for working to defeat COVID-19. Consisting of in-house and outside experts in food and water safety, hygiene and infection prevention, and hotel operations, our Marriott Cleanliness Council is redefining our cleaning and safety standards. Starting with our public spaces and high-traffic areas, Marriott is going above and beyond our normal protocols. We are cleaning surfaces with increased frequency, dedicated staff, and recommended cleaning agents. Marriott has elevated our rigorous protocols to thoroughly clean all surfaces with hospital-grade disinfectants. We will be placing disinfectant wipes in rooms. Hand sanitizing stations are being installed at hotel entrances, at our front desks, our elevator banks, and meeting spaces. Signage in public spaces will remind Marriott guests to maintain social distancing. Read more about Marriott’s Commitment to Clean by visiting https://clean.marriott.com/.

We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at The Dunes Motor Inn as you experience all of the things South Yarmouth has to offer.

Choice Hotels takes pride in its hotels’ long-standing dedication to cleanliness, including our 150+ point cleanliness checklist already on every housekeeping cart as part of the Room Condition & Cleanliness program.  

As part of the Commitment to Clean initiative, Choice Hotels has provided our franchisees additional educational resources - enhanced best practices and extensive cleaning, disinfecting, hygiene, and social distancing best practices and protocols - leveraging partnerships with industry leaders and providing hotels with the latest resources and training. 

In addition, every Choice-branded hotel will designate a “Commitment to Clean Captain,” who will complete best-in-class cleanliness training and will be responsible for incorporating the new protocols into their hotel’s operations.

If you’re looking for a budget friendly hotel in Pittsfield, look no further than Heart of the Berkshires Motel.

Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Hancock Shaker Village (2.0 mi) and Samuel Harrison House (2.9 mi), guests of Heart Of The Berkshires Hotel can easily experience some of Pittsfield's most well known attractions.

Heart Of The Berkshires Hotel is a budget friendly hotel offering a kitchenette, a refrigerator, and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.

For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.

Pittsfield has plenty of Mexican restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Tito's Mexican Grill, Panchos Mexican Restaurant, and Hot Harry's Fresh Burritos, which are serving up some great dishes.

If you are interested in exploring Pittsfield, check out a park, such as Canoe Meadows Wildlife Sanctuary.

The staff at Heart of the Berkshires Motel looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

hotel_one_review: Value hotel offering in-room air conditioning, a picnic area and free internet.
description: Located 1 mile from the University of Massachusetts- Dartmouth, this motel features free Wi-Fi and rooms with a microwave and refrigerator. New Bedford is 5 miles away. Rooms at the Dartmouth Motor Inn offer cable TV and an en suite bathroom. They are simply decorated in soft colors and have carpeted floors. Guests can visit the 24-hour reception at the Dartmouth Motel. Free parking and free local calling are also available. Several restaurants are within 1 mile of the motel, including T.G.I. Friday's, Azuma Asian Bistro, and Marisol’s Cafe. Horseneck Beach State Reservation is 13 miles from the motel. Buttonwood Park Zoo is 4 miles away. This property is also rated for the best value in North Dartmouth! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city.
